*/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 00172000
**                                                                    * 00173000
**   PROCEDURE NAME = IGGPBCCA                                @ZA29164* 00174000
**                                                                    * 00175000
**   DESCRIPTIVE NAME = BUILD CCA                                     * 00176000
**                                                                    * 00177000
**   FUNCTION =                                                       * 00178000
**      INITIALIZES THE CCA WHICH RESIDES IN THE CONTROLLERS          * 00179000
**      WORK AREA (IFC0002F) AT SYMBOLIC LOCATION ACCA. ISSUES        * 00180000
**      GETMAIN SUBPOOL 229 FOR SIX 512-BYTE RECORD AREAS AND @ZA29164* 00181000
**      A 5K-BYTE CATALOG INTEGRITY WORK AREA IF THE CALLER   @ZA29164* 00182000
**      IS EITHER IN SUPERVISOR STATE, SYSTEM KEY, TRANS-     @ZA29164* 00183000
**      LATED REQUEST, OR APF AUTHORIZED. IF THE CALLER IS    @ZA29164* 00184000
**      NON OF THESE, THE VSAM CATALOG INTERFACE (I.E., CPL,  @ZA29164* 00185000
**      FPL'S, FVT'S, USER WORKAREAS, ETC.) ARE VALIDITY      @ZA29164* 00186000
**      CHECKED AND MOVED INTO KEY 0, FETCH PROTECTED CORE.   @ZA29164* 00187000
**      THIS IS DONE BEFORE ANY ACTUAL VSAM CATALOG FUNCTION  @ZA29164* 00188000
**      IS PERFORMED. WHEN THE CATALOG REQUEST IS COMPLETE,   @ZA29164* 00189000
**      THE CATALOG INTERFACE BLOCKS ARE MOVED BACK TO USERS  @ZA29164* 00190000
**      STORAGE AND CONTROL IS RETURN TO THE CALLER.          @ZA29164* 00191000
**      CHECKS RESUME PSW IN CALLERS RB, IF CALLER IS AUTHORIZED      * 00192000
**      SETS SYSTEM CALLER BIT IN CCA.                                * 00193000
**                                                                    * 00194000
**      NOTES =                                               @ZA29164* 00195000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 00196000
**        REGISTER CONVENTIONS =                              @ZA29164* 00197000
**           R0-R1     WORK REGISTERS             VOLATILE    @ZA29164* 00198000
**           R2-R4     WORK REGISTERS             VOLATILE    @ZA29164* 00199000
**           R5-R9     COMPILER/WORK REGS         VOLATILE    @ZA29164* 00200000
**           R10       BASE REGISTER 2            VOLATILE    @ZA29164* 00201000
**           R11       CCA POINTER                SAVED       @ZA29164* 00202000
**           R12       BASE REGISTER 1         SAVED/RESTORED @ZA29164* 00203000
**           R13       SAVEAREA POINTER        SAVED/RESTORED @ZA29164* 00204000
**           R14       RETURN REGISTER         SAVED/RESTORED @ZA29164* 00205000
**           R15       ENTRY POINT                VOLATILE    @ZA29164* 00206000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 00207000
**      ENTRY POINT = IGGPBCCA                                @ZA29164* 00208000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 00209000
**        LINKAGE = CALL                                      @ZA29164* 00210000
**           CALLED BY IGG0CLC9 TO INITIALIZE THE CCA,        @ZA29164* 00211000
**           GETMAIN THE RECORD AREA AND IF NECESSARY THE     @ZA29164* 00212000
**           CATALOG INTEGRITY AREA.                          @ZA29164* 00213000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 00214000
**      INPUT =                                               @ZA29164* 00215000
**           R2 = CONTROLLERS WORK AREA ADDRESS               @ZA29164* 00216000
**           R3 = RETURN ADDRESS OF IGG0CLA1                  @ZA29164* 00217000
**           R5 = CPL ADDRESS                                 @ZA29164* 00218000
**           R10 = SECOND BASE REGISTER                       @ZA29164* 00219000
**           R11 = CCA ADDRESS                                @ZA29164* 00220000
**           R12 = FIRST BASE REGISTER                        @ZA29164* 00221000
**           R14 = RETURN ADDRESS                             @ZA29164* 00222000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 00223000
**      OUTPUT =                                              @ZA29164* 00224000
**           CCA/RECORD AREAS BUILT AND INITIALIZED           @ZA29164* 00225000
**           NON-AUTHORIZED USERS INTERFACE IN PROTECTED      @ZA29164* 00226000
**           STORAGE.                                         @ZA29164* 00227000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 00228000
**      MESSAGES =                                            @ZA29164* 00229000
**           IEC338I - IGG0CLC9, VALIDITY CHECK FAILED ON     @ZA29164* 00230000
**                     CATALOG PARAMETER LIST STORAGE         @ZA29164* 00231000
**           IEC339I - IGG0CLC9, INSUFFICIENT STORAGE FOR     @ZA29164* 00232000
**                     VSAM CATALOG WORK AREAS                @ZA29164* 00233000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 00234000
**      EXIT-NORMAL = TO CALLER                               @ZA29164* 00235000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 00236000
**      EXIT-ERROR = IGGPVCER ROUTINE                         @ZA29164* 00237000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 00238000
**      EXTERNAL REFERENCES =                                 @ZA29164* 00239000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 00240000
**        MODULES = NONE                                      @ZA29164* 00241000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 00242000
**        DATA AREAS =                                        @ZA29164* 00243000
**           CONTROLLER'S WORKAREA, CATALOG INTERFACE         @ZA29164* 00244000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 00245000

               RELATED=('BEFORE ESTAE CALL') /*FREE LCL LK     Y02020*/ 00339000

         LA    R0,3072                                             0279 00353000
*   CCAGDGUY=ON;                    /* ASSUME AUTHORIZED     @ZA29164*/ 00354000
         OI    CCAGDGUY(R11),B'00010000'                           0280 00355000

         SLR   R3,R3                                               0282 00359000
         IC    R3,RBPSWKEY+16(,R1)                                 0282 00360000
*   SRL(R3,4);                      /* ISOLATE KEY           @ZA29164*/ 00361000
         SRL   R3,4                                                0283 00362000
*   SLL(R3,4);                      /* READJUST KEY          @ZA29164*/ 00363000
         SLL   R3,4                                                0284 00364000
*   GEN REFS(R3,R11) SETS(CCAUSKEY)(STC   R3,CCAUSKEY(,R11));/* SAVE    00365000
*                                      THE CALLERS PSW KEY   @ZA29164*/ 00366000
         STC   R3,CCAUSKEY(,R11)                                        00367000
*   IF R3<PROBKEY|                  /* CALLER KEY LT 8 OR    @ZA29164*/ 00368000
*       RBRPSWPS=OFF THEN           /* SUPERVISOR STATE      @ZA29164*/ 00369000
         C     R3,@CF00043                                         0286 00370000

         TM    RBRPSWPS+16(R1),B'00000001'                         0286 00372000
         BNZ   @RF00286                                            0286 00373000
@RT00286 DS    0H                                                  0287 00374000
*     CCASKYSS=ON;                  /* YES, SET INDICATOR    @ZA29164*/ 00375000
         OI    CCASKYSS(R11),B'00100000'                           0287 00376000
*   ELSE                            /* NO                    @ZA29164*/ 00377000
*     IF CALLTYPE¬='00'X THEN       /* TRANSLATED REQUEST?   @ZA29164*/ 00378000
         B     @RC00286                                            0288 00379000
@RF00286 CLI   CALLTYPE(R2),X'00'                                  0288 00380000
         BE    @RF00288                                            0288 00381000
*       DO;                         /* NO                    @ZA29164*/ 00382000
*         GEN(STM R0,R3,12(R13));   /* SAVE REGS             @ZA29164*/ 00383000
         STM R0,R3,12(R13)                                              00384000
*         RFY                                                      0291 00385000
*          (R14,                                                   0291 00386000
*           R15,                                                   0291 00387000
*           R0) RSTD;               /*                       @ZA29164*/ 00388000
*         GEN REFS(CVT)(TESTAUTH FCTN=1,RBLEVEL=2,BRANCH=YES);/*   0292 00389000
*                                                            @ZA29164   00390000
*                                      IS CALLER AUTHORIZED  @ZA29164*/ 00391000
         TESTAUTH FCTN=1,RBLEVEL=2,BRANCH=YES                           00392000
*         GEN(LM R0,R3,12(R13));    /* RESTORE REGS          @ZA29164*/ 00393000
         LM R0,R3,12(R13)                                               00394000
*         RFY                                                      0294 00395000
*           R14 UNRSTD;             /*                       @ZA29164*/ 00396000
*         IF R15¬=ZERO THEN         /* CALLER AUTHORIZED?    @ZA29164*/ 00397000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             0295 00398000
         BZ    @RF00295                                            0295 00399000
*           DO;                     /* NO                    @ZA29164*/ 00400000
*             R0=R0+(5*1024);       /* SIZE OF RECORD AREAS PLUS CICB   00401000
*                                      AND CISA.             @ZA29164*/ 00402000
         AL    R0,@CF04149                                         0297 00403000
*             CCAGDGUY=OFF;         /* NON-AUTHERIZED CALLER @ZA29164*/ 00404000
         NI    CCAGDGUY(R11),B'11101111'                           0298 00405000

*           ;                       /*                       @ZA29164*/ 00408000

*       END;                        /*                       @ZA29164*/ 00410000
*     ELSE                                                         0302 00411000

*                                                                  0302 00413000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00415000
*   /*                                                               */ 00416000
*   /* GET STORAGE FOR RECORD AREAS AND IF NEEDED            @ZA29164*/ 00417000
*   /* THE CICB AND CISA.                                    @ZA29164*/ 00418000
*   /*                                                               */ 00419000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00420000
*                                                                  0303 00421000
*   RFY                                                            0303 00422000
*     R15 RSTD;                     /*                       @ZA29164*/ 00423000
@RC00286 DS    0H                                                  0304 00424000
*   GEN(GETMAIN RC,LV=(0),SP=229,BNDRY=PAGE  GET STORAGE);         0304 00425000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00428000
*   /*                                                               */ 00429000
*   /* CHECK RETURN CODE FROM CONDITIONAL GETMAIN            @Y30SSSM*/ 00430000
*   /*                                                               */ 00431000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00432000
*                                                                  0305 00433000
*   IF R15=RCS THEN                 /* GETMAIN FAIL          @ZA29164*/ 00434000

*     DO;                           /* NO                    @ZA29164*/ 00437000
*       RFY                                                        0307 00438000
*         R15 UNRSTD;               /*                       @ZA29164*/ 00439000

*       /*************************************************************/ 00443000
*       /*                                                           */ 00444000

*        (R8,                                                      0314 00462000

*       RFY                                                        0317 00468000
*        (R0,                                                      0317 00469000
*         R8,                                                      0317 00470000
*         R9) UNRSTD;               /*                       @ZA29164*/ 00471000

*IGGPVCER:                                                         0416 00773000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);/* SPECIFY PROCEDURE OPTIONS     */ 00774000
IGGPVCER DS    0H                                                  0417 00775000
*Z015:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 00776000
*Z015VCER:                          /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 00777000
*   RFY                                                            0417 00778000
*    (R5,                                                          0417 00779000
*     R6,                                                          0417 00780000
*     R7,                                                          0417 00781000

*     R9) UNRSTD;                   /* PL/S COMPILER WORK REGISTERS  */ 00783000

Z015VCER DS    0H                                                  0418 00785000
*   RFY                                                            0418 00786000
*    (R2,                                                          0418 00787000
*     R3,                                                          0418 00788000

*     END;                          /*                       @ZA29164*/ 01036000
*   ELSE                                                           0497 01037000
*     ;                             /*                       @ZA29164*/ 01038000

*   R1=TCBRBP;                      /* CURRENT RB POINTER    @ZA29164*/ 01040000
         L     @05,CVTPTR                                          0498 01041000

*   R5=R1;                          /* CURRENT RB            @ZA29164*/ 01054000

*   CALL EXIT;                      /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 01066000
*   GEN(DS 0F);                     /* FULLWORD BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT   */ 01067000

*/*        IGGPRCU  -  PROCEDURE  INTERNALLY  CALLED  UNNESTED       */ 01077000

*IGGPRCU:                                                          0512 01081000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);/* SPECIFY PROCEDURE OPTIONS     */ 01082000
IGGPRCU  DS    0H                                                  0513 01083000
*Z019:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 01084000
*Z019RCU:                           /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 01085000
*   RFY                                                            0513 01086000
*    (R5,                                                          0513 01087000
*     R6,                                                          0513 01088000
*     R7,                                                          0513 01089000
*     R8,                                                          0513 01090000
*     R9) UNRSTD;                   /* PL/S COMPILER WORK REGISTERS  */ 01091000
Z019     DS    0H                                                  0513 01092000
Z019RCU  DS    0H                                                  0514 01093000
*   RFY                                                            0514 01094000
*    (R2,                                                          0514 01095000
*     R3,                                                          0514 01096000
*     R4) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT LOCAL WORK REGISTERS */ 01097000
*/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 01098000
**                                                                    * 01099000
**  PROCEDURE NAME = IGGPRCU                                          * 01100000
**                                                                    * 01101000
**  DESCRIPTIVE NAME = REQUEST CLEANUP                                * 01102000
**                                                                    * 01103000
**  FUNCTION =                                                        * 01104000
**     IGGPRCU - REQUEST CLEANUP                                      * 01105000
**        RECEIVES CONTROL WHEN CATALOG PROCESSING IS COMPLETE        * 01106000
**          IF CATALOG (MASTER OR USER) THEN                          * 01107000
**            IF CCA INDICATES AN EARLY EXIT THEN                     * 01108000
**              IF OPEN OF CATALOG                                    * 01109000
**              -FREES DRWA IF ONE EXISTS                             * 01110000
**              -BUILDS RPL'S BASED ON THE NUMBER OF DATA BUFFERS     * 01111000
**               LESS ONE. AND INITIALIZES RPL'S                      * 01112000
**              -IF NOT BUILD                                         * 01113000
**                 ISSUES VERIFY                                      * 01114000
**            IF CLOSE OF CATALOG                                     * 01115000
**              -FREES RPL'S                                          * 01116000
**              -FREES CAXWA IF NOT SYSTEM CALLER.                    * 01117000
**          IF NOT EARLY EXIT OR AFTER EARLY EXIT PROCESSING.         * 01118000
**          CHECKS FOR CHECK POINT CCR REQUIRED, IF SO CALLS IGGPCCCR * 01119000
**          (EXTERNAL).                                               * 01120000
**          CALLS RPL FREE UP - IGGPRPLF (EXTERNAL)                   * 01121000
**          FREES THE RECORD AREAS, CICB/CISA IF PRESENT      @ZA29164* 01122000
**          RESTORES REGISTERS FOR IGC0002F                           * 01123000
**          RETURNS (VIA REG 14) TO IGG0CLA1 WITH REG 1 NEGATIVE.     * 01124000
**                                                                    * 01125000
**      NOTES =                                               @ZA29164* 01126000
**        THE ENTRY REGISTERS TO THIS MODULE NEDDED FOR       @ZA29164* 01127000
**        RETURN ARE RESTORED FROM THE SVRB EXTENDED SAVE     @ZA29164* 01128000
**        AREA WHERE IGGPBCCA SAVED THEM.                     @ZA29164* 01129000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 01130000
**        REGISTER CONVENTIONS =                              @ZA29164* 01131000
**           R0-R1     WORK REGISTERS             VOLATILE    @ZA29164* 01132000
**           R2-R4     WORK REGISTERS             VOLATILE    @ZA29164* 01133000
**           R5-R9     COMPILER/WORK REGS         VOLATILE    @ZA29164* 01134000
**           R10       BASE REGISTER 2            VOLATILE    @ZA29164* 01135000
**           R11       CCA POINTER                SAVED       @ZA29164* 01136000
**           R12       BASE REGISTER 1         SAVED/RESTORED @ZA29164* 01137000
**           R13       SAVEAREA POINTER        SAVED/RESTORED @ZA29164* 01138000
**           R14       RETURN REGISTER         SAVED/RESTORED @ZA29164* 01139000
**           R15       ENTRY POINT                VOLATILE    @ZA29164* 01140000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 01141000
**      ENTRY POINT = IGGPRCU                                 @ZA29164* 01142000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 01143000
**        LINKAGE = CALL                                      @ZA29164* 01144000
**           CALLED BY IGG0CLC9 INTERNALLY.                   @ZA29164* 01145000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 01146000
**      INPUT =                                               @ZA29164* 01147000
**           R10 = SECOND BASE REGISTER                       @ZA29164* 01148000
**           R11 = CCA ADDRESS                                @ZA29164* 01149000
**           R12 = FIRST BASE REGISTER                        @ZA29164* 01150000
**           R14 = RETURN ADDRESS                             @ZA29164* 01151000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 01152000
**      OUTPUT =                                              @ZA29164* 01153000
**           R1 = CPL ADDRESS IN 2'S COMPLIMENT               @ZA29164* 01154000
**           R2 = RETURN ERROR CODE                           @ZA29164* 01155000
**           R12 = IGC0002F WORK AREA ADDRESS                 @ZA29164* 01156000
**           RPL'S IF OPEN REQUEST                            @ZA29164* 01157000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 01158000
**      MESSAGES = NONE                                       @ZA29164* 01159000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 01160000
**      EXIT-NORMAL = TO IGG0CLA1                             @ZA29164* 01161000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 01162000
**      EXIT-ERROR = TO IGG0CLA1                              @ZA29164* 01163000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 01164000
**      EXTERNAL REFERENCES =                                 @ZA29164* 01165000
**                                                            @ZA29164* 01166000
**        MODULES =                                           @ZA29164* 01167000
**           IGGPARFS - TRACKING TABLE FULL ROUTINE           @ZA29164* 01168000
**           IGGPRCCR - READ CATALOG CONTROL RECORD (CCR)     @ZA29164* 01169000
**           IGGPRARC - READ CRA CCR                          @ZA29164* 01170000
**           IGGPCCCR - CHECK POINT THE CCR                   @ZA29164* 01171000

*           ELSE                    /* NOT SCHEDULER INVOKED @ZA25763*/ 01958000
*             CAXFLGS=CAXFLGS&MASK; /*                       @ZA25763   01959000

*   /*                                                               */ 02064000
*   /* THE FOLLOWING CODE IS A DEBUG AID.                    @Y30SSRG*/ 02065000
*   /* TO USE THIS AID SET THE 2ND BYTE OF CVTAMFF AS        @Y30SSRG*/ 02066000
*   /* FOLLOWS:                                              @Y30SSRG*/ 02067000
*   /*                                                       @Y30SSRG*/ 02068000
*   /* X'01' = TAKE ACTION FOR ALL CATLG RETURN CODES.       @Y30SSRG*/ 02069000
*   /* X'02' = TAKE ACTION ONLY FOR NON-ZERO RET CODES.      @Y30SSRG*/ 02070000
*   /* X'03' = TAKE ACTION ONLY FOR ABNORMAL RET CODES.      @Y30SSRG*/ 02071000
*   /* X'04'-X'FF' = TAKE ACTION WHENEVER THE CATLG          @Y30SSRG*/ 02072000
*   /* RETURN CODE EQUALS THE VALUE STORD                    @Y30SSRG*/ 02073000
*   /*                                                       @Y30SSRG*/ 02074000
*   /* SET THE 3RD & 4TH BYTES OF CVTAMFF TO X"07FE"         @Y30SSRG*/ 02075000
*   /* (BR 14 INST).                                         @Y30SSRG*/ 02076000
*   /* ACTIONS:                                              @Y30SSRG*/ 02077000
*   /* - IF YOU WISH TO TRAP THE EVENT THEN SET A HDWE       @Y30SSRG*/ 02078000
*   /* ADDRESS STOP OR A DSS "AT" OR A VM "ADSTOP" AT        @Y30SSRG*/ 02079000
*   /* THE ADDRESS OF CVTAMFF BYTE 3.                        @Y30SSRG*/ 02080000
*   /* - IF YOU WISH TO CAUSE A MESSAGE TO BE ISSUED         @Y30SSRG*/ 02081000
*   /* WHENEVER THE EVENT IS DETECTED THEN SET BIT 5         @Y30SSRG*/ 02082000
*   /* OF THE 1ST BYTE OF CVTAMFF TO A 1 (X'04' BIT).        @Y30SSRG*/ 02083000
*   /*                                                       @Y30SSRG*/ 02084000
*   /* NOTE: DO NOT CHANGE THE VALUES OF BITS 0-3            @Y30SSRG*/ 02085000
*   /* WITHIN THIS BYTE.                                     @Y30SSRG*/ 02086000
*   /*                                                       @Y30SSRG*/ 02087000
*   /* TO DISCONTUE USE SET THE 2ND BYTE OF CVTAMFF          @Y30SSRG*/ 02088000
*   /* TO X'00'.                                             @Y30SSRG*/ 02089000
*   /*                                                               */ 02090000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02091000
*                                                                  0747 02092000
*   IF DBGARG¬='00'X THEN           /* ANY ACTION IND        @Y30SSRG*/ 02093000

*     DO;                           /* YES                   @Y30SSRG*/ 02097000

         BE    @GL00012                                            0749 02123000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),8                                       0749 02124000
         BE    @GL00012                                            0749 02125000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),36                                      0749 02126000
         BE    @GL00012                                            0749 02127000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),40                                      0749 02128000
         BE    @GL00012                                            0749 02129000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),44                                      0749 02130000
         BE    @GL00012                                            0749 02131000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),76                                      0749 02132000
         BE    @GL00012                                            0749 02133000

         BNE   @GL00017                                            0749 02135000

*/*                                                                  */ 02600000
*/*        IGGPMDAT  -  PROCEDURE  EXTERNALLY  CALLED  NESTED        */ 02601000
*/*                                                                  */ 02602000

*                                                                  0891 02604000
*IGGPMDAT:                                                         0891 02605000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);/* SPECIFY PROCEDURE OPTIONS     */ 02606000
IGGPMDAT DS    0H                                                  0892 02607000
*   GEN(ENTRY IGGPMDAT );           /* IDENTIFY ENTRY-POINT SYMBOL   */ 02608000
         ENTRY IGGPMDAT                                                 02609000
*Z042:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 02610000
*Z042MDAT:                          /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 02611000
*   RFY                                                            0893 02612000
*    (R5,                                                          0893 02613000
*     R6,                                                          0893 02614000
*     R7,                                                          0893 02615000
*     R8,                                                          0893 02616000
*     R9) UNRSTD;                   /* PL/S COMPILER WORK REGISTERS  */ 02617000
Z042     DS    0H                                                  0893 02618000
Z042MDAT DS    0H                                                  0894 02619000
*   RFY                                                            0894 02620000
*    (R2,                                                          0894 02621000
*     R3,                                                          0894 02622000
*     R4) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT LOCAL WORK REGISTERS */ 02623000
*   GEN(STM 12,14,12(13));          /* SAVE REGISTERS OF CALLER      */ 02624000
         STM 12,14,12(13)                                               02625000
*   GEN(LA 13,12(13));              /* POINT TO NEXT SAVE AREA       */ 02626000
         LA 13,12(13)                                                   02627000
*   GEN(BALR 12,0);                 /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY      */ 02628000
         BALR 12,0                                                      02629000
*   GEN(USING *,12);                /* INDICATE AVAILABLE BASE REG   */ 02630000
         USING *,12                                                     02631000
*   GEN(B *+6);                     /* BRANCH AROUND CONSTANT        */ 02632000
         B *+6                                                          02633000
*   GEN(DC AL2(*-@MAINENT-4));      /* OFFSET TO MODULE BASE 1       */ 02634000
         DC AL2(*-@MAINENT-4)                                           02635000
*   GEN(SH 12,*-2);                 /* COMPUTE MODULE BASE 1         */ 02636000
         SH 12,*-2                                                      02637000
*   GEN(LA 10,4095(0,12));          /* LOAD BASE 2 REG WITH 4095     */ 02638000
         LA 10,4095(0,12)                                               02639000
*   GEN(USING @MAINENT,12);         /* INDICATE AVAILABLE BASE REG1  */ 02640000
         USING @MAINENT,12                                              02641000
*   GEN(USING @MAINENT+4095,10);    /* INDICATE AVAILABLE BASE REG2     02642000
*                                                            @ZA29164*/ 02643000
         USING @MAINENT+4095,10                                         02644000
*/********************************************************** @ZA29164*/ 02645000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02646000
*/*  PROCEDURE NAME = IGGPMDAT                               @ZA29164*/ 02647000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02648000
*/*  DESCRIPTIVE NAME = MOVE DATA TO KEY 0 PROCEDURE         @ZA29164*/ 02649000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02650000
*/*  FUNCTION =                                              @ZA29164*/ 02651000
*/*     THIS PROCEDURE WILL MOVE THE USER DATA TO A KEY 0    @ZA29164*/ 02652000
*/*     AREA. THE LENGTH OF THE AREA TO BE MOVED WILL BE     @ZA29164*/ 02653000
*/*     COMPARED AGAINST THE LENGTH OF THE OUTPUT AREA TO    @ZA29164*/ 02654000
*/*     VERIFY THAT THE MOVE CAN BE DONE. IF THE OUTPUT      @ZA29164*/ 02655000
*/*     AREA IS INSUFFICIENT THEN THIS PROCEDURE WILL SET    @ZA29164*/ 02656000
*/*     A FLAG BIT CICCOUNT AND INCREMENT THE MOVE LENGTH    @ZA29164*/ 02657000
*/*     BUT NOT MOVE ANY DATA.                               @ZA29164*/ 02658000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02659000
*/*  REGISTER CONVENTIONS =                                  @ZA29164*/ 02660000
*/*     REGISTERS R0-R5 ARE SAVED UPON ENTERING              @ZA29164*/ 02661000
*/*     R6-R9    WORK REGISTERS     VOLATILE                 @ZA29164*/ 02662000
*/*     R15      WORK REGISTER      VOLATILE                 @ZA29164*/ 02663000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02664000
*/*  INPUT =                                                 @ZA29164*/ 02665000
*/*     INPUT TO THIS PROCEDURE IS A POINTER CICBKPTR TO     @ZA29164*/ 02666000
*/*     THE POINTER OF THE BLOCK TO BE MOVED AND CICBKLNG,   @ZA29164*/ 02667000
*/*     WHICH IS THE LENGTH OF THE BLOCK.                    @ZA29164*/ 02668000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02669000
*/*  OUTPUT =                                                @ZA29164*/ 02670000
*/*     NORMAL OUTPUT WILL CONSIST OF THE BLOCK MOVED TO     @ZA29164*/ 02671000
*/*     KEY 0 STORAGE WITH THE POINTER UPDATED TO THE        @ZA29164*/ 02672000
*/*     ADDRESS OF THE NEW LOCATION.                         @ZA29164*/ 02673000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02674000
*/********************************************************** @ZA29164*/ 02675000
*                                                                  0905 02676000
*   GEN(STM 2,5,12(13));            /* SAVE REGS 2 THROUGH 5 @ZA29164*/ 02677000
         STM 2,5,12(13)                                                 02678000
*   RFY                                                            0906 02679000
*    (R1,                                                          0906 02680000
*     R7,                                                          0906 02681000
*     R8,                                                          0906 02682000
*     R9,                                                          0906 02683000
*     R15) RSTD;                    /* RESTRICT WORK REGS    @ZA29164*/ 02684000
*   R3=BLOCKPTR;                    /* GET POINTER TO BLOCK  @ZA29164*/ 02685000
         L     @14,CICBKPTR(,R4)                                   0907 02686000
         L     R3,BLOCKPTR(,@14)                                   0907 02687000
*   R7=R3;                          /* SAVE POINTER          @ZA29164*/ 02688000
         LR    R7,R3                                               0908 02689000
*   R9=CICNXTBK;                    /* PTR TO OUTPUT AREA    @ZA29164*/ 02690000
         L     R9,CICNXTBK(,R4)                                    0909 02691000
*   R8=R3;                          /* SAVE POINTER          @ZA29164*/ 02692000
         LR    R8,R3                                               0910 02693000
*   R8=R8&ROUNDUP;                  /* ROUND BACK TO WORD    @ZA29164   02694000
*                                      BOUNDRY               @ZA29164*/ 02695000
         ICM   @14,15,ROUNDUP                                      0911 02696000
         NR    R8,@14                                              0911 02697000
*   R3=R3&ACWD;                     /* AND OUT ALL BUT LAST  @ZA29164   02698000
*                                      TWO BITS OF BLOCK PTR @ZA29164*/ 02699000
         ICM   @14,15,ACWD                                         0912 02700000
         NR    R3,@14                                              0912 02701000
*   R15=CICBKLNG;                   /* GET BLOCK LENGTH      @ZA29164*/ 02702000
         L     R15,CICBKLNG(,R4)                                   0913 02703000
*   R7=R15+R7;                      /* AND OUT ALL BUT LAST  @ZA29164*/ 02704000
         ALR   R7,R15                                              0914 02705000
*   R7=R7&ACWD;                     /* TWO BITS OF END OF    @ZA29164   02706000
*                                      BLOCK PTR             @ZA29164*/ 02707000
*                                                                  0915 02708000
         NR    R7,@14                                              0915 02709000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02710000
*   /*                                                               */ 02711000
*   /* ROUND UP BLOCK LENGTH BY EXAMINING THE START AND END  @ZA29164*/ 02712000
*   /* OF THE BLOCK BOUNDRY.                                 @ZA29164*/ 02713000
*   /*                                                               */ 02714000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02715000
*                                                                  0916 02716000
*   IF R3¬=ZERO THEN                /* IF DOES NOT START ON  @ZA29164*/ 02717000
         LTR   R3,R3                                               0916 02718000
         BZ    @RF00916                                            0916 02719000
*     R15=R15+R3;                   /* WORD BOUNDRY ROUND UP @ZA29164*/ 02720000
         ALR   R15,R3                                              0917 02721000
*   ELSE                                                           0918 02722000
*     ;                             /* STARTS ON BOUNDRY     @ZA29164*/ 02723000
@RF00916 DS    0H                                                  0919 02724000
*   IF R7¬=ZERO THEN                /* END ON WORD BOUNDRY   @ZA29164*/ 02725000
         LTR   R7,R7                                               0919 02726000
         BZ    @RF00919                                            0919 02727000
*     DO;                           /* NO                    @ZA29164*/ 02728000
*       R15=R15+FOUR;               /* ROUND UP TO WORD      @ZA29164*/ 02729000
         AL    R15,@CF00059                                        0921 02730000
*       R15=R15-R7;                 /* BOUNDRY               @ZA29164*/ 02731000
         SLR   R15,R7                                              0922 02732000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA29164*/ 02733000
*   ELSE                                                           0924 02734000
*     ;                             /* ENDS ON BOUNDRY       @ZA29164*/ 02735000
*                                                                  0924 02736000
@RF00919 DS    0H                                                  0925 02737000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02738000
*   /*                                                               */ 02739000
*   /* DETERMINE AMOUNT OF STORAGE NEEDED FOR THE BLOCK TO   @ZA29164*/ 02740000
*   /* BE MOVED AND IF THERE IS ENOUGH ROOM TO MOVE IT.      @ZA29164*/ 02741000
*   /*                                                               */ 02742000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02743000
*                                                                  0925 02744000
*   IF R15>CICRMBYT THEN            /* ENOUGH ROOM IN AREA   @ZA29164*/ 02745000

*     IF CICCISSP¬=ZERO THEN        /* SECONDARY AREA EXIST  @ZA29164*/ 02748000

*       IF CICPTRSW=ON THEN         /* WERE PTRS PREVIOUSLY  @ZA29164   02752000

*         DO;                       /* YES, AND NOW THERE IS @ZA29164   02756000

*           CALL EXIT;              /* RETURN                @ZA29164*/ 02761000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0930 02762000
*         END;                      /*                       @ZA29164*/ 02763000
*       ELSE                        /* PTRS WERE NOT         @ZA29164*/ 02764000
*         DO;                       /* PREVIOSLY SWITCHED    @ZA29164*/ 02765000

@RF00927 DS    0H                                                  0933 02767000

@RF00926 DS    0H                                                  0939 02782000
*         CICCOUNT=ON;              /* SET COUNT MODE        @ZA29164*/ 02783000

*         CALL EXIT;                /* RETURN TO DRIVER      @ZA29164*/ 02790000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0941 02791000
*       END;                        /*                       @ZA29164*/ 02792000

*   /*                                                               */ 02813000
*   /* LOOP TO MOVE DATA AS LONG AS THE DATA TO BE MOVED IS  @ZA29164*/ 02814000
*   /* GREATER THAN 31 BYTES                                 @ZA29164*/ 02815000
*   /*                                                               */ 02816000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02817000
*                                                                  0947 02818000

*     SPKA(CCAUSKEY);               /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @ZA29164*/ 02825000

         SPKA  0(@14)                                              0949 02828000

*                                                                  0956 02845000

         BH    @DL00948                                            0956 02847000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02848000
*   /*                                                               */ 02849000
*   /* MOVE DATA THAT IS LESS THAN 32 BYTES IN LENGTH. THE   @ZA29164*/ 02850000
*   /* NUMBER OF BYTES MOVED WILL BE ROUNDED UP TO A         @ZA29164*/ 02851000
*   /* FULL WORD.                                            @ZA29164*/ 02852000
*   /*                                                               */ 02853000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02854000
*                                                                  0957 02855000
*   IF R15¬=ZERO THEN               /* ANY DATA TO BE MOVED  @ZA29164*/ 02856000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             0957 02857000
         BZ    @RF00957                                            0957 02858000
*     DO;                           /* YES                   @ZA29164*/ 02859000
*       SRA(R15,TWO);               /* DIVIDE LENGTH BY FOUR @ZA29164   02860000

*       R15=R15-ONE;                /* ADJUST REG COUNT      @ZA29164*/ 02864000

*       GEN(SPKA 0);                /* SWITCH TO KEY 0       @ZA29164*/ 02873000

*       GEN REFS(STORREGS) SETS(R0,R1,R2,R3,R4,R5,R6,R7);          0964 02875000

*     END;                          /*                       @ZA29164*/ 02878000
*   ELSE                                                           0966 02879000
*     ;                             /* NO DATA TO BE MOVED   @ZA29164*/ 02880000
@RF00957 DS    0H                                                  0967 02881000
*   RFY                                                            0967 02882000
*     R15 RSTD;                     /*                       @ZA29164*/ 02883000
*   GEN(LM 2,5,12(13));             /* RESTORE REGS 2 TO 5   @ZA29164*/ 02884000

*   CALL EXIT;                      /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 02886000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0969 02887000
*   GEN(DS 0F);                     /* FULLWORD BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT   */ 02888000

*   GEN(DC CL8'IGGPCFPL');          /* NAME OF FOLLOWING PROCEDURE   */ 02890000
         DC CL8'IGGPCFPL'                                               02891000
*   END;                            /* END OF INNER PROCEDURE        */ 02892000

*                                                                  0973 02897000

*/*        IGGPCFPL  -  PROCEDURE  EXTERNALLY  CALLED  NESTED        */ 02900000

*                                                                  0973 02903000
*IGGPCFPL:                                                         0973 02904000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);/* SPECIFY PROCEDURE OPTIONS     */ 02905000
IGGPCFPL DS    0H                                                  0974 02906000
*   GEN(ENTRY IGGPCFPL );           /* IDENTIFY ENTRY-POINT SYMBOL   */ 02907000
         ENTRY IGGPCFPL                                                 02908000
*Z043:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 02909000
*Z043CFPL:                          /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 02910000
*   RFY                                                            0975 02911000
*    (R5,                                                          0975 02912000
*     R6,                                                          0975 02913000
*     R7,                                                          0975 02914000
*     R8,                                                          0975 02915000
*     R9) UNRSTD;                   /* PL/S COMPILER WORK REGISTERS  */ 02916000
Z043     DS    0H                                                  0975 02917000
Z043CFPL DS    0H                                                  0976 02918000
*   RFY                                                            0976 02919000
*    (R2,                                                          0976 02920000
*     R3,                                                          0976 02921000
*     R4) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT LOCAL WORK REGISTERS */ 02922000
*   GEN(STM 12,14,12(13));          /* SAVE REGISTERS OF CALLER      */ 02923000
         STM 12,14,12(13)                                               02924000
*   GEN(LA 13,12(13));              /* POINT TO NEXT SAVE AREA       */ 02925000
         LA 13,12(13)                                                   02926000
*   GEN(BALR 12,0);                 /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY      */ 02927000
         BALR 12,0                                                      02928000
*   GEN(USING *,12);                /* INDICATE AVAILABLE BASE REG   */ 02929000
         USING *,12                                                     02930000
*   GEN(B *+6);                     /* BRANCH AROUND CONSTANT        */ 02931000
         B *+6                                                          02932000
*   GEN(DC AL2(*-@MAINENT-4));      /* OFFSET TO MODULE BASE 1       */ 02933000
         DC AL2(*-@MAINENT-4)                                           02934000
*   GEN(SH 12,*-2);                 /* COMPUTE MODULE BASE 1         */ 02935000
         SH 12,*-2                                                      02936000
*   GEN(LA 10,4095(0,12));          /* LOAD BASE 2 REG WITH 4095     */ 02937000
         LA 10,4095(0,12)                                               02938000
*   GEN(USING @MAINENT,12);         /* INDICATE AVAILABLE BASE REG1  */ 02939000
         USING @MAINENT,12                                              02940000
*   GEN(USING @MAINENT+4095,10);    /* INDICATE AVAILABLE BASE REG2     02941000
*                                                            @ZA29164*/ 02942000
         USING @MAINENT+4095,10                                         02943000
*/********************************************************** @ZA29164*/ 02944000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02945000
*/* PROCEDURE NAME = IGGPCFPL                                @ZA29164*/ 02946000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02947000
*/* DESCRIPTIVE NAME = FPL DRIVER                            @ZA29164*/ 02948000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02949000
*/* FUNCTION =                                               @ZA29164*/ 02950000
*/* THE FPL DRIVER WILL MOVE THE USERS FPL'S AND ASSOCIATED  @ZA29164*/ 02951000
*/* DATA AREAS FROM USERS CORE TO KEY 0 FETCH PROTECTED      @ZA29164*/ 02952000
*/* CORE. EACH CALL TO THIS DRIVER WILL PROCESS ONE BASE FPL @ZA29164*/ 02953000
*/* AND ANY ASSOCIATED TEST FPL'S.                           @ZA29164*/ 02954000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02955000
*/* INPUT = ADDRESS OF FIELD CONTAINING POINTER TO BASE      @ZA29164*/ 02956000
*/*         FPL LOADED INTO CICBKPTR.                        @ZA29164*/ 02957000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02958000
*/* OUTPUT = ADDRESS OF BASE FPL MOVED TO KEY 0 CORE.        @ZA29164*/ 02959000
*/*          POINTERS IN FPL(S) MOVED TO KEY 0 CORE WILL     @ZA29164*/ 02960000
*/*          REFLECT DATA MOVED TO KEY 0 CORE.               @ZA29164*/ 02961000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 02962000
*/********************************************************** @ZA29164*/ 02963000
*                                                                  0987 02964000
*   CICREGSV=R3;                    /* SAVE REGISTER 3       @ZA29164*/ 02965000
         ST    R3,CICREGSV(,R4)                                    0987 02966000
*   RFY                                                            0988 02967000
*     CTGFL BASED(FPLPTR);          /* BASE FPL ON LOCAL PTR @ZA29164*/ 02968000
*   FPLPTR=BLOCKPTR;                /* RESET FPL POINTER     @ZA29164*/ 02969000
         L     @14,CICBKPTR(,R4)                                   0989 02970000
         L     FPLPTR,BLOCKPTR(,@14)                               0989 02971000
*   CICBKLNG=LENGTH(CTGFL)+CTGFLDNO*LENGTH(CTGFLDAT);/* SET  @ZA29164   02972000
*                                      LENGTH OF FPL         @ZA29164*/ 02973000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0990 02974000
         IC    @14,CTGFLDNO(,FPLPTR)                               0990 02975000
         SLA   @14,3                                               0990 02976000
         AL    @14,@CF00264                                        0990 02977000
         ST    @14,CICBKLNG(,R4)                                   0990 02978000
*Z044VCHK:                                                         0991 02979000
*   DO;                                                            0991 02980000
Z044VCHK DS    0H                                                  0992 02981000
*     CALL IGGPVCHK;                                               0992 02982000

*     GEN(RLDSBREG IGGPVCHK);       /* RELOAD SECONDARY BASE REG     */ 02984000

*   /*                                                               */ 02993000

*Z045M8BT:                                                         0999 03006000
*       DO;                                                        0999 03007000

*         CALL IGGPM8BT;                                           1000 03009000

*                                                                  1003 03020000
*                                   /* BYTE NAME             @ZA29164*/ 03021000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA29164*/ 03022000

*     ;                             /* FIELD PTR ZERO        @ZA29164*/ 03090000
*                                                                  1028 03091000
@RF01005 DS    0H                                                  1029 03092000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03093000
*   /*                                                               */ 03094000
*   /* CHECK IF MORE THAN 1 GROUP OF DATA TO BE MOVED        @ZA29164*/ 03095000
*   /*                                                               */ 03096000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03097000
*                                                                  1029 03098000
*   IF CTGFLDNO>=TWO THEN           /* MORE FIELDS TO MOVE ? @ZA29164*/ 03099000
@RC01005 CLI   CTGFLDNO(FPLPTR),2                                  1029 03100000
         BL    @RF01029                                            1029 03101000
*     DO CICFPLDI=TWO TO CTGFLDNO;  /* LOOP TO MOVE FIELDS   @ZA29164*/ 03102000
*                                                                  1030 03103000

*Z055:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 03394000
*Z055M8BT:                          /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 03395000

*   RFY                                                            1121 03404000
*    (R2,                                                          1121 03405000
*     R3,                                                          1121 03406000
*     R4) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT LOCAL WORK REGISTERS */ 03407000
*   GEN(STM 12,14,12(13));          /* SAVE REGISTERS OF CALLER      */ 03408000

*   GEN(LA 13,12(13));              /* POINT TO NEXT SAVE AREA       */ 03410000

*   GEN(BALR 12,0);                 /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY      */ 03412000
         BALR 12,0                                                      03413000
*   GEN(USING *,12);                /* INDICATE AVAILABLE BASE REG   */ 03414000

*/***********************************************************@ZA29164*/ 03429000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 03430000
*/* PROCEDURE NAME = IGGPM8BT                                @ZA29164*/ 03431000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 03432000
*/* DESCRIPTIVE NAME = MOVE EIGHT BYTE NAME                  @ZA29164*/ 03433000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 03434000
*/* FUNCTION =                                               @ZA29164*/ 03435000
*/* THE MOVE EIGHT BYTE ROUTINE WILL BE USED TO MOVE EIGHT   @ZA29164*/ 03436000
*/* BYTE NAMES. THESE NAMES DO NOT REQUIRE VERIFICATION      @ZA29164*/ 03437000
*/* BEFORE THEY ARE MOVED.                                   @ZA29164*/ 03438000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 03439000
*/* INPUT = ADDRESS OF EIGHT BYTE NAME IN CICBKPTR           @ZA29164*/ 03440000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 03441000
*/* OUTPUT = ADDRESS OF EIGHT BYTE NAME MOVED TO             @ZA29164*/ 03442000
*/*          KEY 0 CORE. THIS ADDRESS WILL BE PLACED         @ZA29164*/ 03443000
*/*          INTO THE POINTER THAT WAS REFERENCED BY         @ZA29164*/ 03444000
*/*          CICBKPTR.                                       @ZA29164*/ 03445000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 03446000
*/***********************************************************@ZA29164*/ 03447000
*                                                                  1132 03448000
*   IF EIGHT>CICRMBYT THEN          /* ENOUGH ROOM IN AREA   @ZA29164*/ 03449000
         L     @14,CICRMBYT(,R4)                                   1132 03450000
         C     @14,@CF00043                                        1132 03451000
         BNL   @RF01132                                            1132 03452000
*     IF CICCISSP¬=ZERO THEN        /* SECONDARY AREA EXIST  @ZA29164*/ 03453000
         L     @14,CICCISSP(,R4)                                   1133 03454000
         LTR   @14,@14                                             1133 03455000
         BZ    @RF01133                                            1133 03456000
*       IF CICPTRSW=ON THEN         /* WERE POINTERS         @ZA29164   03457000
*                                      PREVIOUSLY SWITCHED   @ZA29164*/ 03458000
         TM    CICPTRSW(R4),B'01000000'                            1134 03459000
         BNO   @RF01134                                            1134 03460000
*         DO;                       /* YES, AND NOW THERE IS @ZA29164   03461000
*                                      NO ROOM IN SECONDARY  @ZA29164   03462000
*                                      AREA                  @ZA29164*/ 03463000
*           CICCOUNT=ON;            /* ALERT DRIVER          @ZA29164*/ 03464000
         OI    CICCOUNT(R4),B'10000000'                            1136 03465000
*           CALL EXIT;              /* RETURN                @ZA29164*/ 03466000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            1137 03467000
*         END;                      /*                       @ZA29164*/ 03468000
*       ELSE                        /* PTRS WERE NOT         @ZA29164*/ 03469000
*         DO;                       /* PREVIOUSLY SWITCHED   @ZA29164*/ 03470000
         B     @RC01134                                            1139 03471000
@RF01134 DS    0H                                                  1140 03472000
*           CICNXTBK=CICCISSP;      /* POINT TO SECOND AREA  @ZA29164*/ 03473000
         L     @14,CICCISSP(,R4)                                   1140 03474000
         ST    @14,CICNXTBK(,R4)                                   1140 03475000
*           CICRMBYT=CICSABYT;      /* SET AVAILABLE BYTES   @ZA29164*/ 03476000
         L     @14,CICSABYT(,R4)                                   1141 03477000
         ST    @14,CICRMBYT(,R4)                                   1141 03478000
*           CICPTRSW=ON;            /* PTRS WERE SWITCHED    @ZA29164*/ 03479000
         OI    CICPTRSW(R4),B'01000000'                            1142 03480000
*         END;                      /*                       @ZA29164*/ 03481000
*     ELSE                          /* SECONDARY AREA DOES   @ZA29164*/ 03482000
*       DO;                         /* NOT EXIST             @ZA29164*/ 03483000
         B     @RC01133                                            1144 03484000
@RF01133 DS    0H                                                  1145 03485000
*         CICCOUNT=ON;              /* SET COUNT MODE        @ZA29164*/ 03486000
         OI    CICCOUNT(R4),B'10000000'                            1145 03487000
*         CICGMCNT=CICGMCNT+R15;    /* ACCUMULATE LENGTH FOR @ZA29164   03488000
*                                      LATER GETMAIN         @ZA29164*/ 03489000
         LR    @14,R15                                             1146 03490000
         AL    @14,CICGMCNT(,R4)                                   1146 03491000
         ST    @14,CICGMCNT(,R4)                                   1146 03492000
*         CICRMBYT=CICRMBYT-R15;    /* UPDATE REMAINING      @ZA29164   03493000
*                                      BYTES                 @ZA29164*/ 03494000
         L     @14,CICRMBYT(,R4)                                   1147 03495000
         SLR   @14,R15                                             1147 03496000
         ST    @14,CICRMBYT(,R4)                                   1147 03497000
*         CALL EXIT;                /* RETURN TO DRIVER      @ZA29164*/ 03498000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            1148 03499000
*       END;                        /*                       @ZA29164*/ 03500000
*   ELSE                                                           1150 03501000
*     ;                             /* ENOUGH ROOM FOR MOVE  @ZA29164*/ 03502000
*                                                                  1150 03503000
@RF01132 DS    0H                                                  1151 03504000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03505000
*   /*                                                               */ 03506000
*   /* MOVE EIGHT BYTE AREA                                  @ZA29164*/ 03507000
*   /*                                                               */ 03508000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03509000
*                                                                  1151 03510000
*   RFY                                                            1151 03511000
*    (R6,                                                          1151 03512000
*     R7) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT LOAD REGS    @ZA29164*/ 03513000
@RC01132 DS    0H                                                  1152 03514000
*   LM(R6,R7,FNAMINPT);             /* LOAD REGISTERS        @ZA29164*/ 03515000
         L     @14,CICBKPTR(,R4)                                   1152 03516000
         L     @05,BLOCKPTR(,@14)                                  1152 03517000

*   STM(R6,R7,FNAMOUTP);            /* STORE REGISTERS       @ZA29164*/ 03519000

*   RFY                                                            1154 03522000

*                                                                  1154 03525000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03526000
*   /*                                                               */ 03527000
*   /* UPDATE INPUT POINTER,OUTPUT POINTER & REMAINING BYTES @ZA29164*/ 03528000
*   /*                                                               */ 03529000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03530000
*                                                                  1155 03531000
*   BLOCKPTR=CICNXTBK;              /* UPDATE INPUT POINTER  @ZA29164*/ 03532000

*   CICNXTBK=CICNXTBK+EIGHT;        /* UPDATE OUTPUT POINTER @ZA29164   03534000
*                                      TO NEXT AREA          @ZA29164*/ 03535000

*   CALL EXIT;                      /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 03544000

*   GEN(DS 0F);                     /* FULLWORD BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT   */ 03546000

*   GEN(DC CL8'IGGPCCPL');          /* NAME OF FOLLOWING PROCEDURE   */ 03548000

*   END;                            /* END OF INNER PROCEDURE        */ 03550000
@EL00007 DS    0H                                                  1161 03551000
@EF00007 DS    0H                                                  1161 03552000

         EJECT                                                          03554000
*                                                                  1162 03555000
*/********************************************************************/ 03556000
*/*                                                                  */ 03557000
*/*        IGGPCCPL  -  PROCEDURE  INTERNALLY  CALLED  NESTED        */ 03558000
*/*                                                                  */ 03559000
*/********************************************************************/ 03560000
*                                                                  1162 03561000
*IGGPCCPL:                                                         1162 03562000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);/* SPECIFY PROCEDURE OPTIONS     */ 03563000
IGGPCCPL DS    0H                                                  1163 03564000
*Z056:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 03565000
*Z056CCPL:                          /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 03566000
*   RFY                                                            1163 03567000
*    (R5,                                                          1163 03568000
*     R6,                                                          1163 03569000
*     R7,                                                          1163 03570000
*     R8,                                                          1163 03571000
*     R9) UNRSTD;                   /* PL/S COMPILER WORK REGISTERS  */ 03572000
Z056     DS    0H                                                  1163 03573000
Z056CCPL DS    0H                                                  1164 03574000
*   RFY                                                            1164 03575000
*    (R2,                                                          1164 03576000
*     R3,                                                          1164 03577000
*     R4) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT LOCAL WORK REGISTERS */ 03578000
*   GEN(STM 12,14,12(13));          /* SAVE REGISTERS OF CALLER      */ 03579000
         STM 12,14,12(13)                                               03580000
*   GEN(LA 13,12(13));              /* POINT TO NEXT SAVE AREA     1166 03581000
*                                                            @ZA29164*/ 03582000
         LA 13,12(13)                                                   03583000
*/********************************************************** @ZA29164*/ 03584000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 03585000
*/* PROCEDURE NAME = IGGPCCPL                                @ZA29164*/ 03586000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 03587000
*/* DESCRIPTIVE NAME = CPL DRIVER                            @ZA29164*/ 03588000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 03589000
*/* FUNCTION =                                               @ZA29164*/ 03590000
*/*   THE PURPOSE OF THIS ROUTINE IS TO CAUSE THE USERS CPL  @ZA29164*/ 03591000
*/*   AND ASSOCIATED DATA AREAS TO BE MOVED FROM THE USERS   @ZA29164*/ 03592000
*/*   CORE TO KEY 0 FETCH PROTECTED CORE,SUBPOOL 229. THE    @ZA29164*/ 03593000
*/*   KEY 0 CORE WILL BE REFERRED TO AS CISA (VSAM           @ZA29164*/ 03594000
*/*   INTEGRITY SAVE AREA). THE ROUTING WORKS IN             @ZA29164*/ 03595000
*/*   CONJUNCTION WITH VALIDITY AND CHECK ROUTINES,          @ZA29164*/ 03596000
*/*   IGGPMDAT,IGGPVCHK,IGGPM8BT,IGGPMPAS,AND IGGPVCGF.      @ZA29164*/ 03597000
*/*   ONE OF THESE ROUTINES IS CALLED EACH TIME A BLOCK OF   @ZA29164*/ 03598000
*/*   CORE IS TO BE MOVED. INPUT TO THE MOVING ROUTINE       @ZA29164*/ 03599000
*/*   CONSISTS OF THE LENGTH OF DATA TO BE MOVED             @ZA29164*/ 03600000
*/*   (CICBKLNG),AND A POINTER(CICBKPTR) TO A FIELD          @ZA29164*/ 03601000
*/*   CONTAINING THE ADDRESS OF THE CORE TO BE MOVED.        @ZA29164*/ 03602000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 03603000
*/* INPUT =                                                  @ZA29164*/ 03604000
*/*   ADDRESS OF CPL IN CCACPL                               @ZA29164*/ 03605000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 03606000
*/* OUTPUT =                                                 @ZA29164*/ 03607000
*/*   CPL AND ASSOCIATED DATA AREAS MOVED TO KEY 0 CORE      @ZA29164*/ 03608000
*/********************************************************** @ZA29164*/ 03609000
*                                                                  1167 03610000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03611000
*   /*                                                               */ 03612000
*   /* VALIDITY CHECK AND MOVE CPL                           @ZA29164*/ 03613000
*   /*                                                               */ 03614000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03615000
*                                                                  1167 03616000
*   CICBKLNG=LENGTH(CTGPL)+CTGNOFLD*4;/* LENGTH OF CPL       @ZA29164*/ 03617000
         L     @14,CCACPL(,R11)                                    1167 03618000
         SLR   @05,@05                                             1167 03619000
         IC    @05,CTGNOFLD(,@14)                                  1167 03620000
         SLA   @05,2                                               1167 03621000
         AL    @05,@CF00117                                        1167 03622000
         ST    @05,CICBKLNG(,R4)                                   1167 03623000
*   CICBKPTR=ADDR(CCACPL);          /* ADDR OF POINTER TO CPL      1168 03624000
*                                                            @ZA29164*/ 03625000
         LA    @14,CCACPL(,R11)                                    1168 03626000
         ST    @14,CICBKPTR(,R4)                                   1168 03627000
*Z057VCHK:                                                         1169 03628000
*   DO;                                                            1169 03629000

*     CALL IGGPVCHK;                                               1170 03631000

*     GEN(RLDSBREG IGGPVCHK);       /* RELOAD SECONDARY BASE REG     */ 03633000

*   CCACPLOK=ON;                    /* CPL IS VALID          @ZA29164*/ 03637000
*                                                                  1173 03638000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 03640000
*   /*                                                               */ 03641000

*   /*                                                               */ 03644000

*                                                                  1174 03646000
*   IF CTGCAT=ZEROP THEN                                           1174 03647000

*Z067:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 03973000

*    (R2,                                                          1266 03984000

*/********************************************************** @ZA29164*/ 04008000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 04009000
*/* PROCEDURE NAME = IGGPMPAS                                @ZA29164*/ 04010000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 04011000
*/* DESCRIPTIVE NAME = PASWORD MOVE PROCEDURE                @ZA29164*/ 04012000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 04013000
*/* FUNCTION =                                               @ZA29164*/ 04014000
*/*           THIS PROCEDURE WILL MOVE THE PASSWORD FROM THE @ZA29164*/ 04015000
*/*           USERS AREA TO THE KEY 0 AREA. THE LOCAL LOCK   @ZA29164*/ 04016000
*/*           WILL BE OBTAINED BEFORE THE PASSWORD IS MOVED  @ZA29164*/ 04017000
*/*           USING A MOVE CHARACTER INSTRUCTION. THIS WILL  @ZA29164*/ 04018000
*/*           PREVENT THE PASSWORD FROM BEING LOADED INTO    @ZA29164*/ 04019000
*/*           REGISTERS AND POSSIBLY BECOMING AN INTEGRITY   @ZA29164*/ 04020000
*/*           EXPOSURE. THE LOCK WILL BE RELEASED AFTER THE  @ZA29164*/ 04021000
*/*           POINTER TO THE PASSWORD IS UPDATED.            @ZA29164*/ 04022000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 04023000
*/* INPUT = INPUT TO THIS PROCEDURE IS A POINTER TO THE      @ZA29164*/ 04024000
*/*         POINTER OF THE PASSWORD AND THE NUMBER OF BYTES  @ZA29164*/ 04025000
*/*         TO BE MOVED.                                     @ZA29164*/ 04026000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 04027000
*/* OUTPUT = NORMAL OUTPUT WILL CONSIST OF THE PASSWORD      @ZA29164*/ 04028000
*/*          MOVED TO KEY 0 CORE AND THE POINTER UPDATED     @ZA29164*/ 04029000
*/*          TO THE ADDRESS OF THE NEW LOCATION.             @ZA29164*/ 04030000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 04031000
*/********************************************************** @ZA29164*/ 04032000
*                                                                  1277 04033000
*   IF CICRMBYT<CICBKLNG THEN       /* ENOUGH ROOM IN AREA   @ZA29164*/ 04034000
         L     @14,CICRMBYT(,R4)                                   1277 04035000
         C     @14,CICBKLNG(,R4)                                   1277 04036000
         BNL   @RF01277                                            1277 04037000
*     IF CICCISSP¬=ZERO THEN        /* SECONDARY AREA EXIST  @ZA29164*/ 04038000

         BZ    @RF01278                                            1278 04041000
*       IF CICPTRSW=ON THEN         /* WERE PTRS PREVIOUSLY  @ZA29164   04042000
*                                      SWITCHED              @ZA29164*/ 04043000

*           CALL EXIT;              /* RETURN                @ZA29164*/ 04051000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            1282 04052000
*         END;                      /*                       @ZA29164*/ 04053000

*   /*                                                               */ 04138000

*   /*                                                               */ 04140000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 04141000

*   /*                                                               */ 04166000

*   /*                                                       @ZA29164*/ 04234000
*   /* FUNCTION =                                            @ZA29164*/ 04235000
*   /* THIS PROCEDURE IS THE DRIVER THAT MOVES               @ZA29164*/ 04236000

*   /* TO THE USERS AREA.                                    @ZA29164*/ 04238000
*   /*                                                       @ZA29164*/ 04239000
