         ICM   R4,15,0(@07)                                        1536 05052000
*       R2=R2-R0;                   /* ROUND INPUT PTR BACK  @ZA29164   05053000
*                                      TO WORD BOUNDARY      @ZA29164*/ 05054000
         SLR   R2,R0                                               1537 05055000
*       R3=R3-R0;                   /* ROUND OUTPUT PTR BACK @ZA29164   05056000
*                                      TO WORD BOUNDARY      @ZA29164*/ 05057000
         SLR   R3,R0                                               1538 05058000
*       GEN REFS(R2,R3,R4) SETS(R1)(ICM R1,R4,0(R2));/* LOAD @ZA29164   05059000
*                                      BYTES INTO REGISTER   @ZA29164*/ 05060000
         ICM R1,R4,0(R2)                                                05061000
*       SPKA(CCAUSKEY);             /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @ZA29164*/ 05062000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             1540 05063000
         IC    @14,CCAUSKEY(,R11)                                  1540 05064000
         SPKA  0(@14)                                              1540 05065000
*       GEN REFS(R1,R3,R4)(STCM R1,R4,0(R3));/* STORE BYTES  @ZA29164   05066000
*                                      INTO USER AREA        @ZA29164*/ 05067000
         STCM R1,R4,0(R3)                                               05068000
*       GEN(SPKA 0);                /* SWITCH BACK TO KEY 0  @ZA29164*/ 05069000
         SPKA 0                                                         05070000
*       R8=R2+FOUR;                 /* MOVE INPUT ADDRESS TO @ZA29164   05071000
*                                      WORD BOUNDARY         @ZA29164*/ 05072000
         LA    @14,4                                               1543 05073000
         LR    R8,R2                                               1543 05074000
         ALR   R8,@14                                              1543 05075000
*       R9=R3+FOUR;                 /* MOVE OUTPUT ADDRESS   @ZA29164   05076000
*                                      TO WORD BOUNDARY      @ZA29164*/ 05077000
         ALR   @14,R3                                              1544 05078000
         LR    R9,@14                                              1544 05079000
*       R15=R15-R0;                 /* DECREMENT LENGTH      @ZA29164*/ 05080000
         SLR   R15,R0                                              1545 05081000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05082000
*   ELSE                                                           1547 05083000
*     ;                             /* BLOCK IS ON BOUNDARY  @ZA29164*/ 05084000
@RF01534 DS    0H                                                  1548 05085000
*   RFY                                                            1548 05086000
*    (R5,                                                          1548 05087000
*     R6,                                                          1548 05088000
*     R7) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT REGS         @ZA29164*/ 05089000
*   RFY                                                            1549 05090000
*     OUTAREA BASED(R8);            /* REBASE KEY 0 AREA     @ZA29164*/ 05091000
*   RFY                                                            1550 05092000
*     USERDATA BASED(R9);           /* REBASE USER OUTPUT    @ZA29164   05093000
*                                      AREA                  @ZA29164*/ 05094000
*                                                                  1550 05095000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05096000
*   /*                                                               */ 05097000
*   /* LOOP TO MOVE DATA AS LONG AS THE DATA TO BE MOVED IS  @ZA29164*/ 05098000
*   /* LONGER THAN 31 BYTES.                                 @ZA29164*/ 05099000
*   /*                                                               */ 05100000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05101000
*                                                                  1551 05102000
*   DO WHILE R15>THIRTY1;           /* THIRTY TWO BYTE LOOP  @ZA29164*/ 05103000
         B     @DE01551                                            1551 05104000
@DL01551 DS    0H                                                  1552 05105000
*     LM(R0,R7,OUTAREA);            /* LOAD 32 BYTES OF      @ZA29164   05106000
*                                      KEY 0 DATA            @ZA29164*/ 05107000
         LM    R0,R7,OUTAREA(R8)                                   1552 05108000
*     SPKA(CCAUSKEY);               /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @ZA29164*/ 05109000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             1553 05110000
         IC    @14,CCAUSKEY(,R11)                                  1553 05111000
         SPKA  0(@14)                                              1553 05112000
*     STM(R0,R7,USERDATA);          /* STORE 32 BYTES IN     @ZA29164   05113000
*                                      USER AREA             @ZA29164*/ 05114000
         STM   R0,R7,USERDATA(R9)                                  1554 05115000
*     GEN(SPKA 0);                  /* SWITCH TO KEY 0       @ZA29164*/ 05116000
         SPKA 0                                                         05117000
*     R15=R15-THIRTY2;              /* DECREMENT LENGTH      @ZA29164*/ 05118000
         LA    @14,32                                              1556 05119000
         SLR   R15,@14                                             1556 05120000
*     R8=R8+THIRTY2;                /* INCREMENT INPUT PTR   @ZA29164*/ 05121000
         ALR   R8,@14                                              1557 05122000
*     R9=R9+THIRTY2;                /* INCREMENT OUTPUT PTR  @ZA29164*/ 05123000
         ALR   R9,@14                                              1558 05124000
*   END;                            /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05125000
*                                                                  1559 05126000
@DE01551 C     R15,@CF00033                                        1559 05127000
         BH    @DL01551                                            1559 05128000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05129000
*   /*                                                               */ 05130000
*   /* MOVE LESS THAN 32 BYTES IF THERE IS DATA REMAINING    @ZA29164*/ 05131000
*   /* TO BE MOVED.                                          @ZA29164*/ 05132000
*   /*                                                               */ 05133000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05134000
*                                                                  1560 05135000
*   IF R15¬=ZERO THEN               /* ANY DATA LEFT         @ZA29164*/ 05136000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             1560 05137000
         BZ    @RF01560                                            1560 05138000
*     DO;                           /* YES                   @ZA29164*/ 05139000
*       R7=R8+R15;                  /* GET ADDR END OF AREA  @ZA29164*/ 05140000
         LR    R7,R8                                               1562 05141000
         ALR   R7,R15                                              1562 05142000
*       R7=R7&ACWD;                 /* GET NUMBER OF BYTES   @ZA29164   05143000
*                                      IN EXCESS OF WORD     @ZA29164   05144000
*                                      BOUNDARY              @ZA29164*/ 05145000
         ICM   @14,15,ACWD                                         1563 05146000
         NR    R7,@14                                              1563 05147000
*       IF R15>THREE THEN           /* LOAD REG MOVE         @ZA29164*/ 05148000
         C     R15,@CF00421                                        1564 05149000
         BNH   @RF01564                                            1564 05150000
*         DO;                       /* YES                   @ZA29164*/ 05151000
*           SRA(R15,TWO);           /* GET NUMBER OF REGS    @ZA29164   05152000
*                                      FOR MOVE              @ZA29164*/ 05153000
         SRA   R15,2                                               1566 05154000
*           R15=R15-ONE;            /* ADJUST REG COUNT      @ZA29164*/ 05155000
         BCTR  R15,0                                               1567 05156000
*           GEN REFS(LOADREGS) SETS(R0,R1,R2,R3,R4,R5,R6);         1568 05157000
*                                                         /* @ZA29164*/ 05158000
           EX R15,LOADREGS          /* LOAD REGISTERS        @ZA29164*/ 05159000
*           SPKA(CCAUSKEY);         /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @ZA29164*/ 05160000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             1569 05161000
         IC    @14,CCAUSKEY(,R11)                                  1569 05162000
         SPKA  0(@14)                                              1569 05163000
*           GEN REFS(STORREGS,R0,R1,R2,R3,R4,R5,R6);               1570 05164000
*                                                   /*       @ZA29164*/ 05165000
           EX R15,STORREGS          /* STORE REGS            @ZA29164*/ 05166000
*           GEN(SPKA 0);            /* SWITCH TO KEY 0       @ZA29164*/ 05167000
         SPKA 0                                                         05168000
*           R15=R15+ONE;            /* ADJUST REG COUNT      @ZA29164*/ 05169000
         AL    R15,@CF00038                                        1572 05170000
*           SLA(R15,TWO);           /* MULTIPLY NUMBER OF    @ZA29164   05171000
*                                      REGS BY FOUR          @ZA29164*/ 05172000
         SLA   R15,2                                               1573 05173000
*           R8=R8+R15;              /* INCREMENT KEY 0 ADDR  @ZA29164*/ 05174000
         ALR   R8,R15                                              1574 05175000
*           R9=R9+R15;              /* INCREMENT USER ADDR   @ZA29164*/ 05176000
         ALR   R9,R15                                              1575 05177000
*           RFY                                                    1576 05178000
*            (R5,                                                  1576 05179000
*             R6) UNRSTD;           /* RELEASE REGISTERS     @ZA29164*/ 05180000
*         END;                      /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05181000
*       ELSE                                                       1578 05182000
*         ;                         /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05183000
@RF01564 DS    0H                                                  1579 05184000
*       IF R7¬=ZERO THEN            /* EXCESS BYTES EXIST    @ZA29164*/ 05185000
         LTR   R7,R7                                               1579 05186000
         BZ    @RF01579                                            1579 05187000
*         DO;                       /* YES                   @ZA29164*/ 05188000
*           R4=MASKARBT(R7);        /* GET MASK              @ZA29164*/ 05189000
         LR    @14,R7                                              1581 05190000
         SLA   @14,2                                               1581 05191000
         LA    @06,MASKARBT-4(@14)                                 1581 05192000
         ICM   R4,15,0(@06)                                        1581 05193000
*           GEN REFS(R4,R8) SETS(R0)(ICM R0,R4,0(R8));/*     @ZA29164*/ 05194000
         ICM R0,R4,0(R8)                                                05195000
*           SPKA(CCAUSKEY);         /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @ZA29164*/ 05196000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             1583 05197000
         IC    @14,CCAUSKEY(,R11)                                  1583 05198000
         SPKA  0(@14)                                              1583 05199000
*           GEN REFS(R0,R4,R9)(STCM R0,R4,0(R9));/*          @ZA29164*/ 05200000
         STCM R0,R4,0(R9)                                               05201000
*           GEN(SPKA 0);            /* SWITCH TO KEY 0       @ZA29164*/ 05202000
         SPKA 0                                                         05203000
*         END;                      /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05204000
*       ELSE                                                       1587 05205000
*         ;                         /* NO EXCESS BYTES       @ZA29164*/ 05206000
@RF01579 DS    0H                                                  1588 05207000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05208000
*   ELSE                                                           1589 05209000
*     ;                             /* NO DATA LEFT          @ZA29164*/ 05210000
@RF01560 DS    0H                                                  1590 05211000
*   R4=CCAR0REC+(6*512);            /* POINT TO CICB         @ZA29164*/ 05212000
         LA    R4,3072                                             1590 05213000
         AL    R4,CCAR0REC(,R11)                                   1590 05214000
*   LM(R0,R9,CICMRGSV);             /* RESTORE REGS 0 TO 9   @ZA29164*/ 05215000
         LM    R0,R9,CICMRGSV(R4)                                  1591 05216000
*   RFY                                                            1592 05217000
*     OUTAREA BASED(R9);            /* REBASE KEY 0 AREA     @ZA29164*/ 05218000
*   RFY                                                            1593 05219000
*     USERDATA BASED(R8);           /* REBASE USER OUTPUT    @ZA29164*/ 05220000
*   RFY                                                            1594 05221000
*    (R0,                                                          1594 05222000
*     R1,                                                          1594 05223000
*     R15) UNRSTD;                  /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05224000
*   CALL EXIT;                      /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 05225000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            1595 05226000
*   GEN(DS 0F);                     /* FULLWORD BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT   */ 05227000
         DS 0F                                                          05228000
*   GEN(DC CL8'IGGPVCHK');          /* NAME OF FOLLOWING PROCEDURE   */ 05229000
         DC CL8'IGGPVCHK'                                               05230000
*   END;                            /* END OF INNER PROCEDURE        */ 05231000
@EL00012 DS    0H                                                  1598 05232000
@EF00012 DS    0H                                                  1598 05233000
@ER00012 BR    @14                                                 1598 05234000
         EJECT                                                          05235000
*                                                                  1599 05236000
*/********************************************************************/ 05237000
*/*                                                                  */ 05238000
*/*        IGGPVCHK  -  PROCEDURE  EXTERNALLY  CALLED  NESTED        */ 05239000
*/*                                                                  */ 05240000
*/********************************************************************/ 05241000
*                                                                  1599 05242000
*IGGPVCHK:                                                         1599 05243000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);/* SPECIFY PROCEDURE OPTIONS     */ 05244000
IGGPVCHK DS    0H                                                  1600 05245000
*   GEN(ENTRY IGGPVCHK );           /* IDENTIFY ENTRY-POINT SYMBOL   */ 05246000
         ENTRY IGGPVCHK                                                 05247000
*Z080:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 05248000
*Z080VCHK:                          /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 05249000
*   RFY                                                            1601 05250000
*    (R5,                                                          1601 05251000
*     R6,                                                          1601 05252000
*     R7,                                                          1601 05253000
*     R8,                                                          1601 05254000
*     R9) UNRSTD;                   /* PL/S COMPILER WORK REGISTERS  */ 05255000
Z080     DS    0H                                                  1601 05256000
Z080VCHK DS    0H                                                  1602 05257000
*   RFY                                                            1602 05258000
*    (R2,                                                          1602 05259000
*     R3,                                                          1602 05260000
*     R4) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT LOCAL WORK REGISTERS */ 05261000
*   GEN(STM 12,14,12(13));          /* SAVE REGISTERS OF CALLER      */ 05262000
         STM 12,14,12(13)                                               05263000
*   GEN(LA 13,12(13));              /* POINT TO NEXT SAVE AREA       */ 05264000
         LA 13,12(13)                                                   05265000
*   GEN(BALR 12,0);                 /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY      */ 05266000
         BALR 12,0                                                      05267000
*   GEN(USING *,12);                /* INDICATE AVAILABLE BASE REG   */ 05268000
         USING *,12                                                     05269000
*   GEN(B *+6);                     /* BRANCH AROUND CONSTANT        */ 05270000
         B *+6                                                          05271000
*   GEN(DC AL2(*-@MAINENT-4));      /* OFFSET TO MODULE BASE 1       */ 05272000
         DC AL2(*-@MAINENT-4)                                           05273000
*   GEN(SH 12,*-2);                 /* COMPUTE MODULE BASE 1         */ 05274000
         SH 12,*-2                                                      05275000
*   GEN(LA 10,4095(0,12));          /* LOAD BASE 2 REG WITH 4095     */ 05276000
         LA 10,4095(0,12)                                               05277000
*   GEN(USING @MAINENT,12);         /* INDICATE AVAILABLE BASE REG1  */ 05278000
         USING @MAINENT,12                                              05279000
*   GEN(USING @MAINENT+4095,10);    /* INDICATE AVAILABLE BASE REG2     05280000
*                                                            @ZA29164*/ 05281000
         USING @MAINENT+4095,10                                         05282000
*/********************************************************** @ZA29164*/ 05283000
*/*  PROCEDURE NAME = IGGPVCHK                               @ZA29164*/ 05284000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 05285000
*/*  DESCRIPTIVE NAME = VALIDITY CHECK AND MOVE USER DATA    @ZA29164*/ 05286000
*/*                     THAT IS LESS THAN 4K IN LENGTH       @ZA29164*/ 05287000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 05288000
*/*  FUNCTION =                                              @ZA29164*/ 05289000
*/*     THIS PROCEDURE WILL VALIDITY CHECK THE USER BLOCK    @ZA29164*/ 05290000
*/*     IN THE USER AREA AND THEN MOVE IT TO A KEY 0         @ZA29164*/ 05291000
*/*     AREA. THE LENGTH OF THE AREA TO BE MOVED WILL BE     @ZA29164*/ 05292000
*/*     COMPARED AGAINST THE LENGTH OF THE OUTPUT AREA TO    @ZA29164*/ 05293000
*/*     VERIFY THAT THE MOVE CAN BE DONE. IF THE OUTPUT      @ZA29164*/ 05294000
*/*     AREA IS INSUFFICIENT THEN THIS PROCEDURE WILL SET    @ZA29164*/ 05295000
*/*     A FLAG BIT CICCOUNT AND INCREMENT THE MOVE LENGTH    @ZA29164*/ 05296000
*/*     BUT NOT MOVE ANY DATA.                               @ZA29164*/ 05297000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 05298000
*/*  REGISTER CONVENTIONS =                                  @ZA29164*/ 05299000
*/*     REGISTERS R0-R5 ARE SAVED UPON ENTERING              @ZA29164*/ 05300000
*/*     R6-R9    WORK REGISTERS     VOLATILE                 @ZA29164*/ 05301000
*/*     R15      WORK REGISTER      VOLATILE                 @ZA29164*/ 05302000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 05303000
*/*  INPUT =                                                 @ZA29164*/ 05304000
*/*     INPUT TO THIS PROCEDURE IS A POINTER CICBKPTR TO     @ZA29164*/ 05305000
*/*     THE POINTER OF THE BLOCK TO BE MOVED AND CICBKLNG,   @ZA29164*/ 05306000
*/*     WHICH IS THE LENGTH OF THE BLOCK.                    @ZA29164*/ 05307000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 05308000
*/*  OUTPUT =                                                @ZA29164*/ 05309000
*/*     NORMAL OUTPUT WILL CONSIST OF THE BLOCK MOVED TO     @ZA29164*/ 05310000
*/*     KEY 0 STORAGE WITH THE POINTER UPDATED TO THE        @ZA29164*/ 05311000
*/*     ADDRESS OF THE NEW LOCATION.                         @ZA29164*/ 05312000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 05313000
*/********************************************************** @ZA29164*/ 05314000
*                                                                  1613 05315000
*   GEN(STM R0,R4,12(13));          /* SAVE REGS 0 TO 4      @ZA29164*/ 05316000
         STM R0,R4,12(13)                                               05317000
*   RFY                                                            1614 05318000
*    (R0,                                                          1614 05319000
*     R1,                                                          1614 05320000
*     R7,                                                          1614 05321000
*     R8,                                                          1614 05322000
*     R9,                                                          1614 05323000
*     R15) RSTD;                    /* RESTRICT WORK REGS    @ZA29164*/ 05324000
*   R3=BLOCKPTR;                    /* GET POINTER TO BLOCK  @ZA29164*/ 05325000
         L     @14,CICBKPTR(,R4)                                   1615 05326000
         L     R3,BLOCKPTR(,@14)                                   1615 05327000
*   R1=R3+CICBKLNG-ONE;             /* GET ADDR OF LAST BYTE @ZA29164   05328000
*                                      IN BLOCK              @ZA29164*/ 05329000
         LR    R1,R3                                               1616 05330000
         AL    R1,CICBKLNG(,R4)                                    1616 05331000
         BCTR  R1,0                                                1616 05332000
*   GEN REFS(R3)(OI 0(R3),X'00');   /* CHECK FIRST BYTE IN   @ZA29164   05333000
*                                      BLOCK                 @ZA29164*/ 05334000
         OI 0(R3),X'00'                                                 05335000
*   GEN REFS(R1)(OI 0(R1),X'00');   /* CHECK LAST BYTE IN    @ZA29164   05336000
*                                      BLOCK                 @ZA29164*/ 05337000
         OI 0(R1),X'00'                                                 05338000
*   R7=R3;                          /* SAVE POINTER          @ZA29164*/ 05339000
         LR    R7,R3                                               1619 05340000
*   R9=CICNXTBK;                    /* PTR TO OUTPUT AREA    @ZA29164*/ 05341000
         L     R9,CICNXTBK(,R4)                                    1620 05342000
*   R8=R3;                          /* SAVE POINTER          @ZA29164*/ 05343000
         LR    R8,R3                                               1621 05344000
*   R8=R8&ROUNDUP;                  /* ROUND BACK TO WORD    @ZA29164   05345000
*                                      BOUNDRY               @ZA29164*/ 05346000
         ICM   @14,15,ROUNDUP                                      1622 05347000
         NR    R8,@14                                              1622 05348000
*   R3=R3&ACWD;                     /* AND OUT ALL BUT LAST  @ZA29164   05349000
*                                      TWO BITS OF BLOCK PTR @ZA29164*/ 05350000
         ICM   @14,15,ACWD                                         1623 05351000
         NR    R3,@14                                              1623 05352000
*   R15=CICBKLNG;                   /* GET BLOCK LENGTH      @ZA29164*/ 05353000
         L     R15,CICBKLNG(,R4)                                   1624 05354000
*   R7=R15+R7;                      /* AND OUT ALL BUT LAST  @ZA29164*/ 05355000
         ALR   R7,R15                                              1625 05356000
*   R7=R7&ACWD;                     /* TWO BITS OF END OF    @ZA29164   05357000
*                                      BLOCK PTR             @ZA29164*/ 05358000
*                                                                  1626 05359000
         NR    R7,@14                                              1626 05360000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05361000
*   /*                                                               */ 05362000
*   /* ROUND UP BLOCK LENGTH BY EXAMINING THE START AND END  @ZA29164*/ 05363000
*   /* OF THE BLOCK BOUNDRY.                                 @ZA29164*/ 05364000
*   /*                                                               */ 05365000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05366000
*                                                                  1627 05367000
*   IF R3¬=ZERO THEN                /* IF DOES NOT START ON  @ZA29164*/ 05368000
         LTR   R3,R3                                               1627 05369000
         BZ    @RF01627                                            1627 05370000
*     R15=R15+R3;                   /* WORD BOUNDRY ROUND UP @ZA29164*/ 05371000
         ALR   R15,R3                                              1628 05372000
*   ELSE                                                           1629 05373000
*     ;                             /* STARTS ON BOUNDRY     @ZA29164*/ 05374000
@RF01627 DS    0H                                                  1630 05375000
*   IF R7¬=ZERO THEN                /* END ON WORD BOUNDRY   @ZA29164*/ 05376000
         LTR   R7,R7                                               1630 05377000
         BZ    @RF01630                                            1630 05378000
*     DO;                           /* NO                    @ZA29164*/ 05379000
*       R15=R15+FOUR;               /* ROUND UP TO WORD      @ZA29164*/ 05380000
         AL    R15,@CF00059                                        1632 05381000
*       R15=R15-R7;                 /* BOUNDRY               @ZA29164*/ 05382000
         SLR   R15,R7                                              1633 05383000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05384000
*   ELSE                                                           1635 05385000
*     ;                             /* ENDS ON BOUNDRY       @ZA29164*/ 05386000
*                                                                  1635 05387000
@RF01630 DS    0H                                                  1636 05388000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05389000
*   /*                                                               */ 05390000
*   /* DETERMINE AMOUNT OF STORAGE NEEDED FOR THE BLOCK TO   @ZA29164*/ 05391000
*   /* BE MOVED AND IF THERE IS ENOUGH ROOM TO MOVE IT.      @ZA29164*/ 05392000
*   /*                                                               */ 05393000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05394000
*                                                                  1636 05395000
*   IF R15>CICRMBYT THEN            /* ENOUGH ROOM IN AREA   @ZA29164*/ 05396000
         C     R15,CICRMBYT(,R4)                                   1636 05397000
         BNH   @RF01636                                            1636 05398000
*     IF CICCISSP¬=ZERO THEN        /* SECONDARY AREA EXIST  @ZA29164*/ 05399000
         L     @14,CICCISSP(,R4)                                   1637 05400000
         LTR   @14,@14                                             1637 05401000
         BZ    @RF01637                                            1637 05402000
*       IF CICPTRSW=ON THEN         /* WERE PTRS PREVIOUSLY  @ZA29164   05403000
*                                      SWITCHED              @ZA29164*/ 05404000
         TM    CICPTRSW(R4),B'01000000'                            1638 05405000
         BNO   @RF01638                                            1638 05406000
*         DO;                       /* YES, AND NOW THERE IS @ZA29164   05407000
*                                      NO ROOM IN SECONDARY  @ZA29164   05408000
*                                      AREA                  @ZA29164*/ 05409000
*           CICCOUNT=ON;            /* ALERT DRIVER          @ZA29164*/ 05410000
         OI    CICCOUNT(R4),B'10000000'                            1640 05411000
*           CALL EXIT;              /* RETURN                @ZA29164*/ 05412000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            1641 05413000
*         END;                      /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05414000
*       ELSE                        /* PTRS WERE NOT         @ZA29164*/ 05415000
*         DO;                       /* PREVIOSLY SWITCHED    @ZA29164*/ 05416000
         B     @RC01638                                            1643 05417000
@RF01638 DS    0H                                                  1644 05418000
*           CICNXTBK=CICCISSP;      /* POINT TO SECOND AREA  @ZA29164*/ 05419000
         L     @14,CICCISSP(,R4)                                   1644 05420000
         ST    @14,CICNXTBK(,R4)                                   1644 05421000
*           CICRMBYT=CICSABYT;      /* SET AVAILABLE BYTES   @ZA29164*/ 05422000
         L     @06,CICSABYT(,R4)                                   1645 05423000
         ST    @06,CICRMBYT(,R4)                                   1645 05424000
*           R9=CICNXTBK;            /* UPDATE OUTPUT PTR     @ZA29164*/ 05425000
         LR    R9,@14                                              1646 05426000
*           CICPTRSW=ON;            /* PTRS WERE SWITCHED    @ZA29164*/ 05427000
         OI    CICPTRSW(R4),B'01000000'                            1647 05428000
*         END;                      /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05429000
*     ELSE                          /* SECONDARY AREA DOES   @ZA29164*/ 05430000
*       DO;                         /* NOT EXIST             @ZA29164*/ 05431000
         B     @RC01637                                            1649 05432000
@RF01637 DS    0H                                                  1650 05433000
*         CICCOUNT=ON;              /* SET COUNT MODE        @ZA29164*/ 05434000
         OI    CICCOUNT(R4),B'10000000'                            1650 05435000
*         CICGMCNT=CICGMCNT+R15;    /* ACCUMULATE LENGTH FOR @ZA29164   05436000
*                                      LATER GETMAIN         @ZA29164*/ 05437000
         LR    @14,R15                                             1651 05438000
         AL    @14,CICGMCNT(,R4)                                   1651 05439000
         ST    @14,CICGMCNT(,R4)                                   1651 05440000
*         CALL EXIT;                /* RETURN TO DRIVER      @ZA29164*/ 05441000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            1652 05442000
*       END;                        /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05443000
*   ELSE                                                           1654 05444000
*     ;                             /* ENOUGH ROOM FOR MOVE  @ZA29164*/ 05445000
@RF01636 DS    0H                                                  1655 05446000
*   BLOCKPTR=CICNXTBK+R3;           /* UPDATE INPUT POINTER  @ZA29164*/ 05447000

         ALR   @06,R15                                             1656 05455000

*   CICRMBYT=CICRMBYT-R15;          /* DECREMENT AVAILABLE   @ZA29164   05457000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 05463000
*   /*                                                               */ 05464000
*   /* LOOP TO MOVE DATA AS LONG AS THE DATA TO BE MOVED IS  @ZA29164*/ 05465000
*   /* GREATER THAN 31 BYTES.                                @ZA29164*/ 05466000
*   /*                                                               */ 05467000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05468000
*                                                                  1658 05469000
*   RFY                                                            1658 05470000
*    (R5,                                                          1658 05471000
*     R6) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT REGS         @ZA29164*/ 05472000
*   DO WHILE R15>THIRTY1;           /* THIRTY TWO BYTE LOOP  @ZA29164*/ 05473000
         B     @DE01659                                            1659 05474000
@DL01659 DS    0H                                                  1660 05475000
*     SPKA(CCAUSKEY);               /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @ZA29164*/ 05476000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             1660 05477000
         IC    @14,CCAUSKEY(,R11)                                  1660 05478000
         SPKA  0(@14)                                              1660 05479000
*     LM(R0,R7,USERDATA);           /* LOAD 32 BYTES OF USER @ZA29164   05480000
*                                      DATA                  @ZA29164*/ 05481000
         LM    R0,R7,USERDATA(R8)                                  1661 05482000
*     GEN(SPKA 0);                  /* SWITCH TO KEY 0       @ZA29164*/ 05483000
         SPKA 0                                                         05484000
*     STM(R0,R7,OUTAREA);           /* STORE 32 BYTES IN     @ZA29164   05485000
*                                      KEY 0 AREA            @ZA29164*/ 05486000
         STM   R0,R7,OUTAREA(R9)                                   1663 05487000
*     R15=R15-THIRTY2;              /* DECREMENT LENGTH      @ZA29164*/ 05488000

*     R8=R8+THIRTY2;                /* INCREMENT INPUT PTR   @ZA29164*/ 05491000
         ALR   R8,@14                                              1665 05492000
*     R9=R9+THIRTY2;                /* INCREMENT OUTPUT PTR  @ZA29164*/ 05493000
         ALR   R9,@14                                              1666 05494000
*   END;                            /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05495000
*                                                                  1667 05496000
@DE01659 C     R15,@CF00033                                        1667 05497000
         BH    @DL01659                                            1667 05498000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05499000
*   /*                                                               */ 05500000
*   /* MOVE DATA THAT IS LESS THAN 32 BYTES IN LENGTH. THE   @ZA29164*/ 05501000
*   /* NUMBER OF BYTES MOVED WILL BE ROUNDED UP TO A         @ZA29164*/ 05502000
*   /* FULL WORD.                                            @ZA29164*/ 05503000
*   /*                                                               */ 05504000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05505000
*                                                                  1668 05506000
*   IF R15¬=ZERO THEN               /* ANY DATA TO BE MOVED  @ZA29164*/ 05507000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             1668 05508000
         BZ    @RF01668                                            1668 05509000
*     DO;                           /* YES                   @ZA29164*/ 05510000
*       SRA(R15,TWO);               /* DIVIDE LENGTH BY FOUR @ZA29164   05511000
*                                      TO GET NO. OF REGS    @ZA29164   05512000
*                                      FOR MOVE              @ZA29164*/ 05513000
         SRA   R15,2                                               1670 05514000
*       R15=R15-ONE;                /* ADJUST REG COUNT      @ZA29164*/ 05515000
         BCTR  R15,0                                               1671 05516000
*       SPKA(CCAUSKEY);             /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @ZA29164*/ 05517000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             1672 05518000
         IC    @14,CCAUSKEY(,R11)                                  1672 05519000
         SPKA  0(@14)                                              1672 05520000
*       GEN REFS(LOADREGS) SETS(R0,R1,R2,R3,R4,R5,R6,R7);          1673 05521000
*                                                     /*     @ZA29164*/ 05522000
        EX R15,LOADREGS             /* LOAD REGISTERS        @ZA29164*/ 05523000
*       GEN(SPKA 0);                /* SWITCH TO KEY 0       @ZA29164*/ 05524000
         SPKA 0                                                         05525000
*       GEN REFS(STORREGS) SETS(R0,R1,R2,R3,R4,R5,R6,R7);          1675 05526000
*                                                     /*     @ZA29164*/ 05527000
        EX R15,STORREGS             /* STORE REGISTERS       @ZA29164*/ 05528000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05529000
*   ELSE                                                           1677 05530000
*     ;                             /* NO DATA TO BE MOVED   @ZA29164*/ 05531000
@RF01668 DS    0H                                                  1678 05532000
*   GEN(LM R0,R4,12(13));           /* RESTORE REGS 0 TO 4   @ZA29164*/ 05533000
         LM R0,R4,12(13)                                                05534000
*   RFY                                                            1679 05535000
*    (R0,                                                          1679 05536000
*     R1,                                                          1679 05537000
*     R15) UNRSTD;                  /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05538000
*   CALL EXIT;                      /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 05539000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            1680 05540000
*   GEN(DS 0F);                     /* FULLWORD BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT   */ 05541000
         DS 0F                                                          05542000
*   GEN(DC CL8'IGGPVCGF');          /* NAME OF FOLLOWING PROCEDURE   */ 05543000
         DC CL8'IGGPVCGF'                                               05544000
*   END;                            /* END OF INNER PROCEDURE        */ 05545000
@EL00013 DS    0H                                                  1683 05546000
@EF00013 DS    0H                                                  1683 05547000
@ER00013 BR    @14                                                 1683 05548000
         EJECT                                                          05549000
*                                                                  1684 05550000
*/********************************************************************/ 05551000
*/*                                                                  */ 05552000
*/*        IGGPVCGF  -  PROCEDURE  INTERNALLY  CALLED  NESTED        */ 05553000
*/*                                                                  */ 05554000
*/********************************************************************/ 05555000
*                                                                  1684 05556000
*IGGPVCGF:                                                         1684 05557000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);/* SPECIFY PROCEDURE OPTIONS     */ 05558000
IGGPVCGF DS    0H                                                  1685 05559000
*Z081:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 05560000
*Z081VCGF:                          /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 05561000
*   RFY                                                            1685 05562000
*    (R5,                                                          1685 05563000
*     R6,                                                          1685 05564000
*     R7,                                                          1685 05565000
*     R8,                                                          1685 05566000
*     R9) UNRSTD;                   /* PL/S COMPILER WORK REGISTERS  */ 05567000
Z081     DS    0H                                                  1685 05568000
Z081VCGF DS    0H                                                  1686 05569000
*   RFY                                                            1686 05570000
*    (R2,                                                          1686 05571000
*     R3,                                                          1686 05572000
*     R4) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT LOCAL WORK REGISTERS */ 05573000
*   GEN(STM 12,14,12(13));          /* SAVE REGISTERS OF CALLER      */ 05574000
         STM 12,14,12(13)                                               05575000
*   GEN(LA 13,12(13));              /* POINT TO NEXT SAVE AREA     1688 05576000
*                                                            @ZA29164*/ 05577000
         LA 13,12(13)                                                   05578000
*/********************************************************** @ZA29164*/ 05579000
*/*  PROCEDURE NAME = IGGPVCGF                               @ZA29164*/ 05580000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 05581000
*/*  DESCRIPTIVE NAME = VALIDITY CHECK AND MOVE USER DATA    @ZA29164*/ 05582000
*/*                     THAT IS GREATER THAN 4K IN LENGTH    @ZA29164*/ 05583000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 05584000
*/*  FUNCTION =                                              @ZA29164*/ 05585000
*/*     THIS PROCEDURE WILL VALIDITY CHECK THE USER BLOCK    @ZA29164*/ 05586000
*/*     IN THE USER AREA AND THEN MOVE IT TO A KEY 0         @ZA29164*/ 05587000
*/*     AREA. THE LENGTH OF THE AREA TO BE MOVED WILL BE     @ZA29164*/ 05588000
*/*     COMPARED AGAINST THE LENGTH OF THE OUTPUT AREA TO    @ZA29164*/ 05589000
*/*     VERIFY THAT THE MOVE CAN BE DONE. IF THE OUTPUT      @ZA29164*/ 05590000
*/*     AREA IS INSUFFICIENT THEN THIS PROCEDURE WILL SET    @ZA29164*/ 05591000
*/*     A FLAG BIT CICCOUNT AND INCREMENT THE MOVE LENGTH    @ZA29164*/ 05592000
*/*     BUT NOT MOVE ANY DATA.                               @ZA29164*/ 05593000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 05594000
*/*  REGISTER CONVENTIONS =                                  @ZA29164*/ 05595000
*/*     REGISTERS R0-R5 ARE SAVED UPON ENTERING              @ZA29164*/ 05596000
*/*     R6-R9    WORK REGISTERS     VOLATILE                 @ZA29164*/ 05597000
*/*     R15      WORK REGISTER      VOLATILE                 @ZA29164*/ 05598000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 05599000
*/*  INPUT =                                                 @ZA29164*/ 05600000
*/*     INPUT TO THIS PROCEDURE IS A POINTER CICBKPTR TO     @ZA29164*/ 05601000
*/*     THE POINTER OF THE BLOCK TO BE MOVED AND CICBKLNG,   @ZA29164*/ 05602000
*/*     WHICH IS THE LENGTH OF THE BLOCK.                    @ZA29164*/ 05603000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 05604000
*/*  OUTPUT =                                                @ZA29164*/ 05605000
*/*     NORMAL OUTPUT WILL CONSIST OF THE BLOCK MOVED TO     @ZA29164*/ 05606000
*/*     KEY 0 STORAGE WITH THE POINTER UPDATED TO THE        @ZA29164*/ 05607000
*/*     ADDRESS OF THE NEW LOCATION.                         @ZA29164*/ 05608000
*/*                                                          @ZA29164*/ 05609000
*/********************************************************** @ZA29164*/ 05610000
*                                                                  1689 05611000
*   GEN(STM R0,R4,12(13));          /* SAVE REGS 0 TO 4      @ZA29164*/ 05612000
         STM R0,R4,12(13)                                               05613000
*   RFY                                                            1690 05614000
*    (R0,                                                          1690 05615000
*     R1,                                                          1690 05616000
*     R7,                                                          1690 05617000
*     R8,                                                          1690 05618000
*     R9,                                                          1690 05619000
*     R15) RSTD;                    /* RESTRICT WORK REGS    @ZA29164*/ 05620000
*   R3=BLOCKPTR;                    /* GET POINTER TO BLOCK  @ZA29164*/ 05621000
         L     @14,CICBKPTR(,R4)                                   1691 05622000
         L     R3,BLOCKPTR(,@14)                                   1691 05623000
*   R1=R3+CICBKLNG-ONE;             /* GET ADDR OF LAST BYTE @ZA29164   05624000
*                                      IN BLOCK              @ZA29164*/ 05625000
         L     @14,CICBKLNG(,R4)                                   1692 05626000
         LR    R1,R3                                               1692 05627000
         ALR   R1,@14                                              1692 05628000
         BCTR  R1,0                                                1692 05629000
*   R2=CICBKLNG-FOUR096;            /* DECREMENT LNG TOTAL   @ZA29164*/ 05630000

         LR    R2,@14                                              1693 05632000
*   GEN REFS(R3)(OI 0(R3),X'00');   /* CHECK FIRST BYTE IN   @ZA29164   05633000
*                                      BLOCK                 @ZA29164*/ 05634000
         OI 0(R3),X'00'                                                 05635000
*   GEN REFS(R1)(OI 0(R1),X'00');   /* CHECK LAST BYTE IN    @ZA29164   05636000
*                                      BLOCK                 @ZA29164*/ 05637000
         OI 0(R1),X'00'                                                 05638000
*   R7=R3;                          /* SAVE POINTER          @ZA29164*/ 05639000
         LR    R7,R3                                               1696 05640000
*   DO UNTIL R2=ZERO;               /* ADDR CHECK LOOP       @ZA29164*/ 05641000
@DL01697 DS    0H                                                  1698 05642000
*     IF R2>FOUR096 THEN            /* FULL BLOCK            @ZA29164*/ 05643000
         L     @14,@CF03779                                        1698 05644000
         CR    R2,@14                                              1698 05645000
         BNH   @RF01698                                            1698 05646000
*       DO;                         /* YES                   @ZA29164*/ 05647000
*         R3=R3+FOUR096;            /* INCR FIRST POINTER    @ZA29164*/ 05648000
         ALR   R3,@14                                              1700 05649000
*         R2=R2-FOUR096;            /* DECREMENT LNG TOTAL   @ZA29164*/ 05650000
         SLR   R2,@14                                              1701 05651000
*       END;                        /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05652000
*     ELSE                          /* LESS THAN FULL BLOCK  @ZA29164*/ 05653000
*       DO;                         /* YES                   @ZA29164*/ 05654000

@RF01698 DS    0H                                                  1704 05656000
*         R3=R3+FOUR096;            /* INCR FIRST POINTER    @ZA29164*/ 05657000

*         R2=0;                     /* ZERO LENGTH TOTAL     @ZA29164*/ 05659000
         SLR   R2,R2                                               1705 05660000
*       END;                        /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05661000
*     GEN REFS(R3)(OI 0(R3),X'00'); /* CHECK FIRST BYTE      @ZA29164   05662000
*                                      IN BLOCK              @ZA29164*/ 05663000
@RC01698 DS    0H                                                  1707 05664000
         OI 0(R3),X'00'                                                 05665000
*   END;                            /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05666000
@DE01697 SLR   @14,@14                                             1708 05667000
         CR    R2,@14                                              1708 05668000
         BNE   @DL01697                                            1708 05669000
*   R9=CICNXTBK;                    /* PTR TO OUTPUT AREA    @ZA29164*/ 05670000
         L     R9,CICNXTBK(,R4)                                    1709 05671000
*   R8=R7;                          /* SAVE POINTER          @ZA29164*/ 05672000
         LR    R8,R7                                               1710 05673000
*   R8=R8&ROUNDUP;                  /* ROUND BACK TO WORD    @ZA29164   05674000
*                                      BOUNDRY               @ZA29164*/ 05675000
         ICM   @06,15,ROUNDUP                                      1711 05676000
         NR    R8,@06                                              1711 05677000
*   R3=R7&ACWD;                     /* AND OUT ALL BUT LAST  @ZA29164   05678000
*                                      TWO BITS OF BLOCK PTR @ZA29164*/ 05679000
         ICM   @06,15,ACWD                                         1712 05680000
         LR    R3,R7                                               1712 05681000
         NR    R3,@06                                              1712 05682000
*   R15=CICBKLNG;                   /* GET BLOCK LENGTH      @ZA29164*/ 05683000
         L     R15,CICBKLNG(,R4)                                   1713 05684000
*   R7=R15+R7;                      /* AND OUT ALL BUT LAST  @ZA29164*/ 05685000
         ALR   R7,R15                                              1714 05686000
*   R7=R7&ACWD;                     /* TWO BITS OF END OF    @ZA29164   05687000
*                                      BLOCK PTR             @ZA29164*/ 05688000
*                                                                  1715 05689000
         NR    R7,@06                                              1715 05690000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05691000
*   /*                                                               */ 05692000
*   /* ROUND UP BLOCK LENGTH BY EXAMINING THE START AND END  @ZA29164*/ 05693000
*   /* OF THE BLOCK BOUNDRY.                                 @ZA29164*/ 05694000
*   /*                                                               */ 05695000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05696000
*                                                                  1716 05697000
*   IF R3¬=ZERO THEN                /* IF DOES NOT START ON  @ZA29164*/ 05698000
         CR    R3,@14                                              1716 05699000
         BE    @RF01716                                            1716 05700000
*     R15=R15+R3;                   /* WORD BOUNDRY ROUND UP @ZA29164*/ 05701000
         ALR   R15,R3                                              1717 05702000
*   ELSE                                                           1718 05703000
*     ;                             /* STARTS ON BOUNDRY     @ZA29164*/ 05704000
@RF01716 DS    0H                                                  1719 05705000
*   IF R7¬=ZERO THEN                /* END ON WORD BOUNDRY   @ZA29164*/ 05706000
         LTR   R7,R7                                               1719 05707000
         BZ    @RF01719                                            1719 05708000
*     DO;                           /* NO                    @ZA29164*/ 05709000
*       R15=R15+FOUR;               /* ROUND UP TO WORD      @ZA29164*/ 05710000
         AL    R15,@CF00059                                        1721 05711000
*       R15=R15-R7;                 /* BOUNDRY               @ZA29164*/ 05712000
         SLR   R15,R7                                              1722 05713000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05714000
*   ELSE                                                           1724 05715000
*     ;                             /* ENDS ON BOUNDRY       @ZA29164*/ 05716000
*                                                                  1724 05717000
@RF01719 DS    0H                                                  1725 05718000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05719000
*   /*                                                               */ 05720000
*   /* DETERMINE AMOUNT OF STORAGE NEEDED FOR THE BLOCK TO   @ZA29164*/ 05721000
*   /* BE MOVED AND IF THERE IS ENOUGH ROOM TO MOVE IT.      @ZA29164*/ 05722000
*   /*                                                               */ 05723000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05724000
*                                                                  1725 05725000
*   IF R15>CICRMBYT THEN            /* ENOUGH ROOM IN AREA   @ZA29164*/ 05726000
         C     R15,CICRMBYT(,R4)                                   1725 05727000

*     IF CICCISSP¬=ZERO THEN        /* SECONDARY AREA EXIST  @ZA29164*/ 05729000
         L     @14,CICCISSP(,R4)                                   1726 05730000
         LTR   @14,@14                                             1726 05731000
         BZ    @RF01726                                            1726 05732000
*       IF CICPTRSW=ON THEN         /* WERE PTRS PREVIOUSLY  @ZA29164   05733000
*                                      SWITCHED              @ZA29164*/ 05734000

         BNO   @RF01727                                            1727 05736000
*         DO;                       /* YES, AND NOW THERE IS @ZA29164   05737000
*                                      NO ROOM IN SECONDARY  @ZA29164   05738000
*                                      AREA                  @ZA29164*/ 05739000
*           CICCOUNT=ON;            /* ALERT DRIVER          @ZA29164*/ 05740000
         OI    CICCOUNT(R4),B'10000000'                            1729 05741000
*           CALL EXIT;              /* RETURN                @ZA29164*/ 05742000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            1730 05743000
*         END;                      /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05744000
*       ELSE                        /* PTRS WERE NOT         @ZA29164*/ 05745000
*         DO;                       /* PREVIOSLY SWITCHED    @ZA29164*/ 05746000
         B     @RC01727                                            1732 05747000
@RF01727 DS    0H                                                  1733 05748000
*           CICNXTBK=CICCISSP;      /* POINT TO SECOND AREA  @ZA29164*/ 05749000
         L     @14,CICCISSP(,R4)                                   1733 05750000
         ST    @14,CICNXTBK(,R4)                                   1733 05751000
*           CICRMBYT=CICSABYT;      /* SET AVAILABLE BYTES   @ZA29164*/ 05752000
         L     @06,CICSABYT(,R4)                                   1734 05753000
         ST    @06,CICRMBYT(,R4)                                   1734 05754000
*           R9=CICNXTBK;            /* UPDATE OUTPUT PTR     @ZA29164*/ 05755000
         LR    R9,@14                                              1735 05756000
*           CICPTRSW=ON;            /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05757000
         OI    CICPTRSW(R4),B'01000000'                            1736 05758000
*         END;                      /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05759000
*     ELSE                          /* SECONDARY AREA DOES   @ZA29164*/ 05760000
*       DO;                         /* NOT EXIST             @ZA29164*/ 05761000
         B     @RC01726                                            1738 05762000
@RF01726 DS    0H                                                  1739 05763000
*         CICCOUNT=ON;              /* SET COUNT MODE        @ZA29164*/ 05764000
         OI    CICCOUNT(R4),B'10000000'                            1739 05765000
*         CICGMCNT=CICGMCNT+R15;    /* ACCUMULATE LENGTH FOR @ZA29164   05766000
*                                      LATER GETMAIN         @ZA29164*/ 05767000
         LR    @14,R15                                             1740 05768000
         AL    @14,CICGMCNT(,R4)                                   1740 05769000
         ST    @14,CICGMCNT(,R4)                                   1740 05770000
*         CALL EXIT;                /* RETURN TO DRIVER      @ZA29164*/ 05771000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            1741 05772000
*       END;                        /*                       @ZA29164*/ 05773000
*   ELSE                                                           1743 05774000
*     ;                             /* ENOUGH ROOM FOR MOVE  @ZA29164*/ 05775000
@RF01725 DS    0H                                                  1744 05776000
*   BLOCKPTR=CICNXTBK+R3;           /* UPDATE INPUT POINTER  @ZA29164*/ 05777000
@RC01725 L     @14,CICBKPTR(,R4)                                   1744 05778000
         L     @06,CICNXTBK(,R4)                                   1744 05779000
         LR    @05,R3                                              1744 05780000
         ALR   @05,@06                                             1744 05781000
         ST    @05,BLOCKPTR(,@14)                                  1744 05782000
*   CICNXTBK=CICNXTBK+R15;          /* UPDATE POINTER TO     @ZA29164   05783000
*                                      NEXT AVAILABLE AREA   @ZA29164*/ 05784000
         ALR   @06,R15                                             1745 05785000
         ST    @06,CICNXTBK(,R4)                                   1745 05786000
*   CICRMBYT=CICRMBYT-R15;          /* DECREMENT AVAILABLE   @ZA29164   05787000
*                                      BYTES IN OUTPUT AREA  @ZA29164*/ 05788000
*                                                                  1746 05789000
         L     @14,CICRMBYT(,R4)                                   1746 05790000
         SLR   @14,R15                                             1746 05791000
         ST    @14,CICRMBYT(,R4)                                   1746 05792000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05793000
*   /*                                                               */ 05794000
*   /* LOOP TO MOVE DATA AS LONG AS THE DATA TO BE MOVED IS  @ZA29164*/ 05795000
*   /* GREATER THAN 31 BYTES                                 @ZA29164*/ 05796000
*   /*                                                               */ 05797000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 05798000
*                                                                  1747 05799000
*   RFY                                                            1747 05800000
*    (R5,                                                          1747 05801000
*     R6) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT REGS         @ZA29164*/ 05802000
*   DO WHILE R15>THIRTY1;           /* THIRTY TWO BYTE LOOP  @ZA29164*/ 05803000
         B     @DE01748                                            1748 05804000

*     SPKA(CCAUSKEY);               /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @ZA29164*/ 05806000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             1749 05807000

         SPKA  0(@14)                                              1749 05809000
*     LM(R0,R7,USERDATA);           /* LOAD 32 BYTES OF USER @ZA29164   05810000
*                                      DATA                  @ZA29164*/ 05811000

*     GEN(SPKA 0);                  /* SWITCH TO KEY 0       @ZA29164*/ 05813000

./  ADD  SSI=52890108,NAME=IGG0CLDA
         TITLE 'IGG0CLDA - CATALOG RECOVERY AREA SERVICES              *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IGG0CLDA CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IGG0CLDA  74.345'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  DS    0H                                                  0002 00010000
         USING @MAINENT,@15                                             00011000
         USING @DATD-(CCATEMPS-IGGCCA),R11                              00012000
         DS 0F                                                          00013000
         DC CL8'IGGPRAPV'                                               00014000
         EJECT                                                          00015000
         B     @PB00002                                            0288 00016000
IGGPRAPV DS    0H                                                  0289 00017000
         ENTRY IGGPRAPV                                                 00018000
         DROP @15                                                       00019000
Z003     DS    0H                                                  0291 00020000
Z003RAPV DS    0H                                                  0292 00021000
         STM 12,14,12(13)                                               00022000
         LA 13,12(13)                                                   00023000
         BALR 12,0                                                      00024000
IGGSEGST DS 0H                                                          00025000
*                                                                  0297 00026000
         USING *,12                                                     00027000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00028000
*   /*                                                               */ 00029000
*   /* THIS ROUTINE : 1. COMPARES THE VOLUME ENTRY TIMESTAMP TO THE  */ 00030000
*   /* VOLUME"S F4 DSCB TIMESTAMP. 2. STORES A NEW TIMESTAMP INTO    */ 00031000
*   /* BOTH THE CATALOG VOLUME ENTRY AND THE VOLUMES F4 DSCB.        */ 00032000
*   /*                                                               */ 00033000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00034000
*                                                                  0298 00035000
*   CCARALSA=CCAURAB;               /* SV INPUT RAB PTR              */ 00036000
         MVC   CCARALSA(4,R11),CCAURAB(R11)                        0298 00037000
*   CCAURAB=CCAR0REC;               /* PT TO F4 RD/WR ROUT WK AREA   */ 00038000
         L     @10,CCAR0REC(,R11)                                  0299 00039000
         ST    @10,CCAURAB(,R11)                                   0299 00040000
*   F4WDUCB=CAXUCB;                 /* ST UCB PTR FOR F4 RD/WR RT    */ 00041000
*                                                                  0300 00042000
         L     @05,CCARAACB(,R11)                                  0300 00043000
         L     @05,ACBUAPTR(,@05)                                  0300 00044000
         MVC   F4WDUCB(3,@10),CAXUCB+1(@05)                        0300 00045000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00046000
*   /*                                                               */ 00047000
*   /* CALL TO MODULE IGG0CLBU                                       */ 00048000
*   /*                                                               */ 00049000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00050000
*                                                                  0301 00051000
*Z004F4RD:                                                         0301 00052000
*   CALL IGGPF4RD;                  /* READ F4 DSCB                  */ 00053000
Z004F4RD L     @15,@CV04232                                        0301 00054000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0301 00055000
*   IF CCACD1=RCS THEN              /* IF SUCCESSFUL                 */ 00056000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0302 00057000
         BNE   @RF00302                                            0302 00058000
*     DO;                                                          0303 00059000
*       IF F4TS2¬=CCAVTS THEN       /* DO TMESTMPS MATCH NO,SET ERROR*/ 00060000
         L     @10,CCAR0REC(,R11)                                  0304 00061000
         CLC   F4TS2+120(8,@10),CCAVTS(R11)                        0304 00062000
         BE    @RF00304                                            0304 00063000
*         DO;                                                      0305 00064000
*           CCAMODID='DA';          /* SET MODULE ID                 */ 00065000
         MVC   CCAMODID(2,R11),@CC04250                            0306 00066000
*           CCAREASN=RSN2;          /* SET REASON CODE               */ 00067000
         MVI   CCAREASN(R11),X'02'                                 0307 00068000
*           CCARETRN=RCNTFMT4;      /* SET RETURN CODE               */ 00069000
         MVI   CCARETRN(R11),X'6A'                                 0308 00070000
*         END;                                                     0309 00071000
*       ELSE                        /* TIMESTAMPS MATCH              */ 00072000
*         DO;                       /* GET NEW TIMESTAMP             */ 00073000
         B     @RC00304                                            0310 00074000
@RF00304 DS    0H                                                  0311 00075000
*           R1=ADDR(CCAVTS);        /* PT TO TIMESTAMP AREA          */ 00076000
         LA    R1,CCAVTS(,R11)                                     0311 00077000
*           GEN REFS(R1) FLOWS(CLOCKOK);                           0312 00078000
                     STCK 0(R1)         /*GET TOD CLOCK VALUE        */ 00079000
                     BZ CLOCKOK         /*BRANCH IF CLOCK IS OK      */ 00080000
*                                   /* CLOCK NOT WORKING             */ 00081000
*           DO;                                                    0313 00082000
*             CCAMODID='DA';        /* SET MODULE ID                 */ 00083000
         MVC   CCAMODID(2,R11),@CC04250                            0314 00084000
*             CCAREASN=RSN0;        /* SET REASON CODE               */ 00085000
         MVI   CCAREASN(R11),X'00'                                 0315 00086000
*             CCARETRN=RCLOCKER;    /* SET RETURN CODE               */ 00087000
         MVI   CCARETRN(R11),X'E4'                                 0316 00088000
*           END;                                                   0317 00089000
*CLOCKOK:                                                          0318 00090000
*         END;                      /* END GET TIMESTAMP             */ 00091000
CLOCKOK  DS    0H                                                  0319 00092000
*     END;                                                         0319 00093000
@RC00304 DS    0H                                                  0320 00094000
*   IF CCACD1¬=RCS THEN             /* ANY ERROR SO FAR              */ 00095000
@RF00302 CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0320 00096000
         BE    @RF00320                                            0320 00097000
*     DO;                           /* YES                           */ 00098000
*                                                                  0321 00099000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00100000
*       /*                                                           */ 00101000
*       /* CALL TO MODULE IGG0CLBU                                   */ 00102000
*       /*                                                           */ 00103000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00104000
*                                                                  0322 00105000
*Z007F4DQ:                                                         0322 00106000
*       CALL IGGPF4DQ;              /* DEQ THE VOLUME                */ 00107000
Z007F4DQ L     @15,@CV04231                                        0322 00108000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0322 00109000
*       CCAURAB=CCARALSA;           /* RESTORE INPUT RCD PTR         */ 00110000
         MVC   CCAURAB(4,R11),CCARALSA(R11)                        0323 00111000
*       CALL EXIT;                  /* GET OUT                       */ 00112000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0324 00113000
*     END;                                                         0325 00114000
*   DS4AMTIM=CCAVTS;                /* NEW VALUE TO 1ST F4 TMESTMP   */ 00115000
@RF00320 LA    @10,120                                             0326 00116000
         AL    @10,CCAR0REC(,R11)                                  0326 00117000
         MVC   DS4AMTIM(8,@10),CCAVTS(R11)                         0326 00118000
*   F4TS2=CCAVTS;                   /* NEW VALUE TO 2ND F4 TMESTMP   */ 00119000
*                                                                  0327 00120000
         MVC   F4TS2(8,@10),CCAVTS(R11)                            0327 00121000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00122000
*   /*                                                               */ 00123000
*   /* CALL TO MODULE IGG0CLBU                                       */ 00124000
*   /*                                                               */ 00125000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00126000
*                                                                  0328 00127000
*Z008F4WR:                                                         0328 00128000
*   CALL IGGPF4WR;                  /* WRITE BACK UPDATED F4 DSCB    */ 00129000
Z008F4WR L     @15,@CV04233                                        0328 00130000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0328 00131000
*   CCAURAB=CCARALSA;               /* RESTORE PTR TO INPUT RCD      */ 00132000
         MVC   CCAURAB(4,R11),CCARALSA(R11)                        0329 00133000
*   IF CCACD1¬=RCS THEN             /* IF WRITE UNSUCCESSFUL         */ 00134000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0330 00135000
         BE    @RF00330                                            0330 00136000
*     CALL EXIT;                    /* GET OUT                       */ 00137000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0331 00138000
*   IF RCDID=TYPV THEN              /* IS INPUT RCD TYPE "V"         */ 00139000
@RF00330 L     @10,CCARAREC(,R11)                                  0332 00140000
         CLI   RCDID(@10),C'V'                                     0332 00141000
         BNE   @RF00332                                            0332 00142000
*     CTVOLTIM=CCAVTS;              /* Y,ST NEW TIMESTMP INTO RCD    */ 00143000
         MVC   CTVOLTIM+48(8,@10),CCAVTS(R11)                      0333 00144000
*   ELSE                            /* INPUT RECORD IS TYPE "W"      */ 00145000
*     DO;                           /* MUST LOCATE BASE VOL RCD      */ 00146000
         B     @RC00332                                            0334 00147000
@RF00332 DS    0H                                                  0335 00148000
*       CCADDDD=CCACBASE*CILEN;     /* PREPARE TO READ VOL RCD       */ 00149000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0335 00150000
         ICM   @10,7,CCACBASE(R11)                                 0335 00151000
         SLA   @10,9                                               0335 00152000
         ST    @10,CCADDDD(,R11)                                   0335 00153000
*       CCAMLRET=R13+TWELVE;        /* ST RETURN ADDR                */ 00154000
         LA    @10,12                                              0336 00155000
         ALR   @10,R13                                             0336 00156000
         ST    @10,CCAMLRET(,R11)                                  0336 00157000
*       XIOOPT=160;                 /* GET OPTIONS                   */ 00158000
         MVI   XIOOPT(R11),X'A0'                                   0337 00159000
*Z009XIO:                                                          0338 00160000
*       CALL IGGPXIO;               /* GET VOL RCD FROM CATLG        */ 00161000
Z009XIO  L     @15,@CV04236                                        0338 00162000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0338 00163000
*       IF CCACD1¬=RCS THEN         /* IF UNSUCCESSFUL               */ 00164000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0339 00165000
         BE    @RF00339                                            0339 00166000
*         DO;                                                      0340 00167000
*           CCASRCIN=RCDCINO;       /* RESTORE INPUT RCD CI #        */ 00168000
         L     @10,CCARAREC(,R11)                                  0341 00169000
         MVC   CCASRCIN(3,R11),RCDCINO(@10)                        0341 00170000
*           CALL EXIT;              /* GET OUT                       */ 00171000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0342 00172000
*         END;                                                     0343 00173000
*       R1=CCARABB->CCACPE1;        /* PT TO BASE RCD AREA           */ 00174000
@RF00339 L     @10,CCARABB(,R11)                                   0344 00175000
         L     R1,CCACPE1(,@10)                                    0344 00176000
*       IF R1->RCDID=TYPV THEN      /* DOES IT CONTAIN VOL RCD       */ 00177000
         CLI   RCDID(R1),C'V'                                      0345 00178000
         BNE   @RF00345                                            0345 00179000
*         DO;                       /* YES                           */ 00180000
*           RFY                                                    0347 00181000
*             CATRCD BASED(R1);                                    0347 00182000
*           CTVOLTIM=CCAVTS;        /* ST NEW TMESTMP INTO VOL RCD   */ 00183000
         MVC   CTVOLTIM+48(8,R1),CCAVTS(R11)                       0348 00184000
*           RFY                                                    0349 00185000
*             CATRCD BASED(CCARAREC);                              0349 00186000
*         END;                                                     0350 00187000
*       CCARAREC=CCAR0REC;          /* PT TO VOL RCD                 */ 00188000
@RF00345 L     @10,CCAR0REC(,R11)                                  0351 00189000
         ST    @10,CCARAREC(,R11)                                  0351 00190000
*       CTVOLTIM=CCAVTS;            /* ST NEW TMESTMP INTO VOL RCD   */ 00191000
         MVC   CTVOLTIM+48(8,@10),CCAVTS(R11)                      0352 00192000
*       CCARARBA=CATVOLCI;          /* ST VOL RCD CRA CI NO          */ 00193000
         MVC   CCARARBA(4,R11),@CF02656                            0353 00194000
*       XIOOPT=0;                   /* PUT OPTIONS                   */ 00195000
         MVI   XIOOPT(R11),X'00'                                   0354 00196000
*Z010XRIO:                                                         0355 00197000
*       CALL IGGPXRIO;              /* WRITE VOL RCD INTO CRA        */ 00198000
Z010XRIO L     @15,@CV04237                                        0355 00199000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0355 00200000
*       IF CCACD1=RCS THEN          /* IF SUCCESSFUL                 */ 00201000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0356 00202000
         BNE   @RF00356                                            0356 00203000
*         DO;                                                      0357 00204000
*           CCADDDD=RCDCINO*CILEN;  /* ST VOL RCD CATLG CI #         */ 00205000
         L     @10,CCARAREC(,R11)                                  0358 00206000
         SLR   @05,@05                                             0358 00207000
         ICM   @05,7,RCDCINO(@10)                                  0358 00208000
         SLA   @05,9                                               0358 00209000
         ST    @05,CCADDDD(,R11)                                   0358 00210000
*           CCAMLRET=R13+TWELVE;    /* ST RETURN ADDR                */ 00211000
         LA    @10,12                                              0359 00212000
         ALR   @10,R13                                             0359 00213000
         ST    @10,CCAMLRET(,R11)                                  0359 00214000
*           XIOOPT=32;              /* PUT OPTIONS                   */ 00215000
         MVI   XIOOPT(R11),X'20'                                   0360 00216000
*Z011XIO:                                                          0361 00217000
*           CALL IGGPXIO;           /* WRITE VOL RCD TO CAT          */ 00218000
Z011XIO  L     @15,@CV04236                                        0361 00219000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0361 00220000
*         END;                                                     0362 00221000
*       CCARAREC=CCACPE1;           /* RESTORE PTR TO INPUT RCD      */ 00222000
@RF00356 L     @10,CCAURAB(,R11)                                   0363 00223000
         L     @10,CCACPE1(,@10)                                   0363 00224000
         ST    @10,CCARAREC(,R11)                                  0363 00225000
*       CCASRCIN=RCDCINO;           /* RESTORE INPUT RCD CAT CI NO   */ 00226000
         MVC   CCASRCIN(3,R11),RCDCINO(@10)                        0364 00227000
*       IF CCACD1¬=RCS THEN         /* WERE WRITES OK                */ 00228000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0365 00229000
         BE    @RF00365                                            0365 00230000
*         CALL EXIT;                /* NO,GET OUT                    */ 00231000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0366 00232000
*     END;                                                         0367 00233000
@RF00365 DS    0H                                                  0368 00234000
*   CAXF2VTU=ON;                    /* IND THAT TMESTMPS WERE UPD    */ 00235000
@RC00332 L     @10,CCARAACB(,R11)                                  0368 00236000
         L     @10,ACBUAPTR(,@10)                                  0368 00237000
         OI    CAXF2VTU(@10),B'00000001'                           0368 00238000
*   CALL EXIT;                      /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 00239000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0369 00240000
*   GEN(DS 0F);                     /* FULLWORD BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT   */ 00241000
         DS 0F                                                          00242000
*   GEN(DC CL8'IGGPMODI');          /* NAME OF FOLLOWING PROCEDURE   */ 00243000
         DC CL8'IGGPMODI'                                               00244000
*   END;                            /* END OF INNER PROCEDURE        */ 00245000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                                  0372 00246000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  0372 00247000
@ER00002 BR    @14                                                 0372 00248000
