@PB00002 DS    0H                                                  0373 00249000
*   GEN(EJECT);                     /* GO TO A NEW PRINT PAGE        */ 00250000
         EJECT                                                          00251000
*                                                                  0374 00252000
*/********************************************************************/ 00253000
*/*                                                                  */ 00254000
*/*        IGGPMODI  -  PROCEDURE  EXTERNALLY  CALLED  NESTED        */ 00255000
*/*                                                                  */ 00256000
*/********************************************************************/ 00257000
*                                                                  0374 00258000
*IGGPMODI:                                                         0374 00259000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);/* SPECIFY PROCEDURE OPTIONS     */ 00260000
         B     @PB00003                                            0374 00261000
IGGPMODI DS    0H                                                  0375 00262000
*   GEN(ENTRY IGGPMODI );           /* IDENTIFY ENTRY-POINT SYMBOL   */ 00263000
         ENTRY IGGPMODI                                                 00264000
*Z012:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 00265000
*Z012MODI:                          /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 00266000
*   RFY                                                            0376 00267000
*    (R5,                                                          0376 00268000
*     R6,                                                          0376 00269000
*     R7,                                                          0376 00270000
*     R8,                                                          0376 00271000
*     R9,                                                          0376 00272000
*     R10) UNRSTD;                  /* PL/S COMPILER WORK REGISTERS  */ 00273000
Z012     DS    0H                                                  0376 00274000
Z012MODI DS    0H                                                  0377 00275000
*   RFY                                                            0377 00276000
*    (R2,                                                          0377 00277000
*     R3,                                                          0377 00278000
*     R4) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT LOCAL WORK REGISTERS */ 00279000
*   GEN(STM 12,14,12(13));          /* SAVE REGISTERS OF CALLER      */ 00280000
         STM 12,14,12(13)                                               00281000
*   GEN(LA 13,12(13));              /* POINT TO NEXT SAVE AREA       */ 00282000
         LA 13,12(13)                                                   00283000
*   GEN(BALR 12,0);                 /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY      */ 00284000
         BALR 12,0                                                      00285000
*   GEN(LA 15,*-IGGSEGST(0,0));     /* COMPUTE MODULE BASE           */ 00286000
         LA 15,*-IGGSEGST(0,0)                                          00287000
*   GEN(SR 12,15);                  /* SET BASE TO MODULE BASE       */ 00288000
         SR 12,15                                                       00289000
*/********************************************************************* 00290000
**                                                                    * 00291000
**   PROCEDURE NAME = IGGPMODI                                        * 00292000
**                                                                    * 00293000
**   PROCEDURE TYPE = EXTERNALLY CALLED, NESTED                       * 00294000
**                                                                    * 00295000
**   DESCRIPTIVE NAME = INTERFACE TO MODIFY FUNCTION                  * 00296000
**                                                                    * 00297000
**   FUNCTION =                                                       * 00298000
**      THIS PROCEDURE IS CALLED BY THE DEFINE CRA MODULE (IGG0CLB4)  * 00299000
**      IN ORDER TO INTERFACE TO THE CATALOG 'MODIFY' ROUTINE         * 00300000
**      IGG0CLAV(IGGPMOD) TO COMPLETE THE RECORD-BUILDING PROCESS     * 00301000
**      DURING DEFINE CRA PROCESSING:                                 * 00302000
**      1.  CONSTRUCT THE 'MODIFY' CPL                                * 00303000
**      2.  CONSTRUCT AN FPL AND RELATED AMDSB                        * 00304000
**      3.  CONSTRUCT AN FPL AND RELATED ASSOCIATION SET OF FIELDS    * 00305000
**      4.  CONSTRUCT AN FPL AND RELATED VOLUME INFORMATION           * 00306000
**          SET OF FIELDS                                             * 00307000
**      5.  PREPARE THE CCA FOR THE CALL TO 'MODIFY'                  * 00308000
**      6.  CALL THE CATALOG 'MODIFY' FUNCTION                        * 00309000
**      7.  RESTORE ESSENTIAL VALUES AND RETURN TO CALLER             * 00310000
**                                                                    * 00311000
**   INPUT =                                                          * 00312000
**      ADDRESS OF CCA IN REGISTER 11                                 * 00313000
**      ADDRESS OF DEFINE CRA WORKAREA IN DCRAWAPR (REGISTER 3)       * 00314000
**                                                                    * 00315000
**   OUTPUT =                                                         * 00316000
**      IF ERROR ENCOUNTERED, 'CCAPROB' CONTAINS PROBLEM              * 00317000
**         DETERMINATION INFORMATION FROM THE 'MODIFY' FUNCTION.      * 00318000
**      CRA BASE DATA RECORD AND EXTENSION RECORD BUILD COMPLETED     * 00319000
**         IN DEFINE CRA'S WORKAREA.                                  * 00320000
**                                                                    * 00321000
**********************************************************************/ 00322000
*/********************************************************************/ 00323000
*/*                 CONSTRUCT  THE  MODIFY  CPL                      */ 00324000
*/********************************************************************/ 00325000
*                                                                  0383 00326000
*   RFY                                                            0383 00327000
*     CTGPL BASED(CCAMCPL);         /* MAP THE CPL TO BUILD IN CORE  */ 00328000
*   CCAMCPL=ADDR(DCRAMCPL);         /* SET ADDR OF MODIFY CPL        */ 00329000
         LA    @10,DCRAMCPL(,DCRAWAPR)                             0384 00330000
         ST    @10,CCAMCPL(,R11)                                   0384 00331000
*   CTGNOFLD=NUMFPLS;               /* NUMBER OF DATA OCCURRENCES    */ 00332000
         MVI   CTGNOFLD(@10),X'03'                                 0385 00333000
*   CTGFIELD(1)=ADDR(DCRAMFPL);     /* SET ADDR OF THE AMDSB FPL     */ 00334000
         LA    @05,DCRAMFPL(,DCRAWAPR)                             0386 00335000
         ST    @05,CTGFIELD(,@10)                                  0386 00336000
*   CTGFIELD(2)=ADDR(DCRASFPL);     /* SET ADDR OF THE ASSOC FPL     */ 00337000
         LA    @05,DCRASFPL(,DCRAWAPR)                             0387 00338000
         ST    @05,CTGFIELD+4(,@10)                                0387 00339000
*   CTGFIELD(3)=ADDR(DCRAVFPL);     /* SET ADDR OF THE VGO FPL       */ 00340000
         LA    @05,DCRAVFPL(,DCRAWAPR)                             0388 00341000
         ST    @05,CTGFIELD+8(,@10)                                0388 00342000
*/********************************************************************/ 00343000
*/*      CONSTRUCT AN FPL AND RELATED AMDSB FOR CALL TO MODIFY       */ 00344000
*/********************************************************************/ 00345000
*                                                                  0389 00346000
*   RFY                                                            0389 00347000
*     CTGFL BASED(CTGFIELD(1));     /* MAP THE AMDSB FPL             */ 00348000
*   CTGFLDNO=NUMLAPRS;              /* NO. OF LENGTH/ADDR PAIRS      */ 00349000
         L     @10,CTGFIELD(,@10)                                  0390 00350000
         MVI   CTGFLDNO(@10),X'01'                                 0390 00351000
*   CTGFLDNM=ADDR(AMDSBCAT);        /* SET FIELD NAME ADDRESS        */ 00352000
         LA    @05,@CC04202                                        0391 00353000
         ST    @05,CTGFLDNM(,@10)                                  0391 00354000
*   CTGFLNG(1)=LENGTH(IDAAMDSB);    /* LENGTH OF THE DATA (AMDSB)    */ 00355000
         LA    @05,96                                              0392 00356000
         ST    @05,CTGFLNG(,@10)                                   0392 00357000
*   CTGFLPT(1)=ADDR(DCRAMDSB);      /* SET ADDRESS OF THE AMDSB      */ 00358000
         LA    @15,DCRAMDSB(,DCRAWAPR)                             0393 00359000
         ST    @15,CTGFLPT(,@10)                                   0393 00360000
*   RFY                                                            0394 00361000
*     IDAAMDSB BASED(CTGFLPT(1));   /* MAP THE AMDSB                 */ 00362000
*   AMDSBID=AMDIDVAL;               /* SET AMDSB CONTROL BLOCK ID    */ 00363000
         MVI   AMDSBID(@15),X'60'                                  0395 00364000
*   AMDCIPCA=DCRABTRK               /* TOTAL NO. OF CI'S PER CA      */ 00365000
*       *DCRATRCY;                                                 0396 00366000
         LH    @10,DCRABTRK(,DCRAWAPR)                             0396 00367000
         MH    @10,DCRATRCY(,DCRAWAPR)                             0396 00368000
         STH   @10,AMDCIPCA(,@15)                                  0396 00369000
*   AMDLEN=LENGTH(IDAAMDSB);        /* SET LENGTH OF THE AMDSB       */ 00370000
         STH   @05,AMDLEN(,@15)                                    0397 00371000
*   AMDCINV=DCRACISZ;               /* SET CI SIZE (512 BYTES)       */ 00372000
         MVC   AMDCINV(4,@15),@CF01041                             0398 00373000
*   AMDLRECL=DCRARCSZ;              /* SET MAX RECRD SIZE (505 BYTES)*/ 00374000
         MVC   AMDLRECL(4,@15),@CF04146                            0399 00375000
*   AMDNEXT=CCANDEXT;               /* SET NUMBER OF EXTENTS FOR CRA */ 00376000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0400 00377000
         IC    @10,CCANDEXT(,R11)                                  0400 00378000
         STH   @10,AMDNEXT(,@15)                                   0400 00379000
*   IF CCAF2CB=OFF THEN             /* CALLER IS DEFINE SPACE        */ 00380000
         TM    CCAF2CB(R11),B'00000010'                            0401 00381000
         BNZ   @RF00401                                            0401 00382000
*     IF(CCAACB->ACBAMBL->AMBLDTA->AMBDSB->AMDWCK=ON) THEN/* CATALOG    00383000
*                                      IS WRITE-CHECK                */ 00384000
         L     @10,CCAACB(,R11)                                    0402 00385000
         L     @10,ACBAMBL(,@10)                                   0402 00386000
         L     @10,AMBLDTA(,@10)                                   0402 00387000
         L     @10,AMBDSB(,@10)                                    0402 00388000
         TM    AMDWCK(@10),B'01000000'                             0402 00389000
         BNO   @RF00402                                            0402 00390000
*       AMDWCK=ON;                  /* SET CRA AS WRITE-CHECK ALSO   */ 00391000
         OI    AMDWCK(@15),B'01000000'                             0403 00392000
*     ELSE                                                         0404 00393000
*       ;                           /* CATALOG IS NOT WRITE-CHECK    */ 00394000
@RF00402 DS    0H                                                  0405 00395000
*   ELSE                            /* CALLER IS DEFINE CATALOG      */ 00396000
*     IF(CCACPL->CTGFVT->CTGFVDCH->CTGFVAMD->CTGFLPT(1)->AMDWCK=ON)     00397000
*       THEN                        /* CATALOG IS WRITE-CHECK        */ 00398000
         B     @RC00401                                            0405 00399000
@RF00401 L     @10,CCACPL(,R11)                                    0405 00400000
         L     @10,CTGFVT(,@10)                                    0405 00401000
         L     @10,CTGFVDCH(,@10)                                  0405 00402000
         L     @10,CTGFVAMD(,@10)                                  0405 00403000
         L     @10,CTGFLPT(,@10)                                   0405 00404000
         TM    AMDWCK(@10),B'01000000'                             0405 00405000
         BNO   @RF00405                                            0405 00406000
*       AMDWCK=ON;                  /* SET CRA AS WRITE-CHECK ALSO   */ 00407000
         L     @10,CCAMCPL(,R11)                                   0406 00408000
         L     @10,CTGFIELD(,@10)                                  0406 00409000
         L     @10,CTGFLPT(,@10)                                   0406 00410000
         OI    AMDWCK(@10),B'01000000'                             0406 00411000
*     ELSE                                                         0407 00412000
*       ;                           /* CATALOG IS NOT WRITE-CHECK    */ 00413000
@RF00405 DS    0H                                                  0408 00414000
*/********************************************************************/ 00415000
*/*   CONSTRUCT AN FPL AND RELATED ASSOCIATION FOR CALL TO MODIFY    */ 00416000
*/********************************************************************/ 00417000
*                                                                  0408 00418000
*   RFY                                                            0408 00419000
*     CTGFL BASED(CTGFIELD(2));     /* MAP THE ASSOCIATION FPL       */ 00420000
@RC00401 DS    0H                                                  0409 00421000
*   CTGFLDNO=NUMLAPRS;              /* NO. OF LENGTH/ADDRESS PAIRS   */ 00422000
         L     @10,CCAMCPL(,R11)                                   0409 00423000
         L     @05,CTGFIELD+4(,@10)                                0409 00424000
         MVI   CTGFLDNO(@05),X'01'                                 0409 00425000
*   CTGFLDNM=ADDR(NAMEDS);          /* SET FIELD NAME ADDRESS        */ 00426000
         LA    @15,@CC04185                                        0410 00427000
         ST    @15,CTGFLDNM(,@05)                                  0410 00428000
*   CTGFLNG(1)=LENGTH(DCRASSOC);    /* SET DATA LENGTH               */ 00429000
         MVC   CTGFLNG(4,@05),@CF00058                             0411 00430000
*   CTGFLPT(1)=ADDR(DCRASSOC);      /* SET DATA LOCATION             */ 00431000
         LA    @15,DCRASSOC(,DCRAWAPR)                             0412 00432000
         ST    @15,CTGFLPT(,@05)                                   0412 00433000
*   DCRATYPE=CATCLSID;              /* SET RECORD AS TYPE 'C'        */ 00434000
         MVI   DCRATYPE(DCRAWAPR),C'C'                             0413 00435000
*   DCRANAME=CLUSTRCI;              /* SET CI NUMBER OF CLUSTER RECD */ 00436000
         MVC   DCRANAME(3,DCRAWAPR),@CF00055+1                     0414 00437000
*/********************************************************************/ 00438000
*/*         CONSTRUCT AN FPL AND RELATED VOLUME INFORMATION          */ 00439000
*/*         SET OF FIELDS FOR CALL TO MODIFY ROUTINE                 */ 00440000
*/********************************************************************/ 00441000
*                                                                  0415 00442000
*   RFY                                                            0415 00443000
*     CTGFL BASED(CTGFIELD(3));     /* MAP THE VOL OCCUR FPL         */ 00444000
*   CTGFLDNO=NUMLAPRS;              /* NO. OF LENGTH/ADDRESS PAIRS   */ 00445000
         L     @10,CTGFIELD+8(,@10)                                0416 00446000
         MVI   CTGFLDNO(@10),X'01'                                 0416 00447000
*   CTGFLDGC=CATVOLGC;              /* SET VOLUME OCCUR GROUP CODE   */ 00448000
         MVI   CTGFLDGC(@10),X'03'                                 0417 00449000
*   CTGFLDNM=ADDR(ENTVOL);          /* SET FIELD NAME ADDRESS        */ 00450000
         LA    @05,@CC04206                                        0418 00451000
         ST    @05,CTGFLDNM(,@10)                                  0418 00452000
*   CTGFLNG(1)=LENGTH(DCRAVGO);     /* LENGTH OF VOLUME GRP OCCUR    */ 00453000
         MVC   CTGFLNG(4,@10),@CF04332                             0419 00454000
*   CTGFLPT(1)=ADDR(DCRAVGO);       /* SET DATA LOCATION             */ 00455000
         LA    @05,DCRAVGO(,DCRAWAPR)                              0420 00456000
         ST    @05,CTGFLPT(,@10)                                   0420 00457000
*   RFY                                                            0421 00458000
*     CTGPL BASED(CCACPL);          /* RE-MAP CATALOG CPL            */ 00459000
*   RFY                                                            0422 00460000
*     GVO BASED(ADDR(DCRAVGOM));    /* MAP VOLUME OCCURRENCE         */ 00461000
*   RFY                                                            0423 00462000
*     UCBOB BASED(CMSDFSPC);        /* BASE UCB ON ADDRESS SET UP IN    00463000
*                                      CMSWA BY IGG0CLAQ             */ 00464000
*   CMFLDEVT=UCBTYP&SYSMASK;        /* SET VOLUME DEVICE TYPE,     0424 00465000
*                                      MASKING OFF SYSTEM BITS       */ 00466000
         LA    @10,322                                             0424 00467000
         ALR   @10,DCRAWAPR                                        0424 00468000
         L     @05,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0424 00469000
         L     @05,CMSDFSPC(,@05)                                  0424 00470000
         L     @15,UCBTYP(,@05)                                    0424 00471000
         N     @15,@CF04169                                        0424 00472000
         ST    @15,CMFLDEVT(,@10)                                  0424 00473000
*   CMFLVOL=UCBVOLI;                /* SET VOLUME SERIAL NUMBER      */ 00474000
         MVC   CMFLVOL(6,@10),UCBVOLI(@05)                         0425 00475000
*   CMFLVLPR=ON;                    /* SET PRIMARY VOLUME FLAG       */ 00476000
         OI    CMFLVLPR(@10),B'10000000'                           0426 00477000
*   CMFLNOEX=NUMEXTS;               /* SET NUMBER OF EXTENTS         */ 00478000
         MVI   CMFLNOEX(@10),X'01'                                 0427 00479000
*   CMFLHABA=DCRACHIA;              /* SET HIGH ALLOCATED RBA OF CRA */ 00480000
         L     @05,DCRACHIA(,DCRAWAPR)                             0428 00481000
         ST    @05,CMFLHABA(,@10)                                  0428 00482000
*   CMFLPHYB=DCRACISZ;              /* SET PHYSICAL BLOCK SIZE       */ 00483000
         MVC   CMFLPHYB(4,@10),@CF01041                            0429 00484000
*   CMFLNBTK=DCRABTRK;              /* SET NO. OF BLOCKS PER TRACK   */ 00485000
         MVC   CMFLNBTK(2,@10),DCRABTRK(DCRAWAPR)                  0430 00486000
*   CMFLNTKA=DCRATRCY;              /* SET NO. OF TRACKS/CONTROL AREA*/ 00487000
         LH    @15,DCRATRCY(,DCRAWAPR)                             0431 00488000
         STH   @15,CMFLNTKA(,@10)                                  0431 00489000
*   CMFLNOPF=ON;                    /* NOT PREFORMATTED SPACE        */ 00490000
         OI    CMFLNOPF(@10),B'01000000'                           0432 00491000
*   CMFLEXLN=LENGTH(CMFXECTS);      /* SET LENGTH OF EXTENT          */ 00492000
         LA    @10,CMFOVERL(,@10)                                  0433 00493000
         MVC   CMFLEXLN-8(2,@10),@CH00110                          0433 00494000
*   RFY                                                            0434 00495000
*     CMFXECTS BASED(ADDR(CMFLEND));/* MAP EXTENT STRUCTURE          */ 00496000
*   CMFXEXSS(1)=CCAEXTSS(1);        /* SET DESCRIPTOR SPACE SEQ NO.  */ 00497000
         AH    @10,@CH00051                                        0435 00498000
         MVC   CMFXEXSS(2,@10),CCAEXTSS(R11)                       0435 00499000
*   CMFXEXST(1)=CCAEXTAD(1);        /* SET STARTING CCHH VALUE       */ 00500000
         MVC   CMFXEXST(4,@10),CCAEXTAD(R11)                       0436 00501000
*   CMFXNOTT(1)=CCAEXTTH(1);        /* SET NO. OF TRACKS IN EXTENT   */ 00502000
         LH    @14,CCAEXTTH(,R11)                                  0437 00503000
         STH   @14,CMFXNOTT(,@10)                                  0437 00504000
*   CMFXEDCC(1)=                    /* COMPUTE AND SET ENDING CYL    */ 00505000
*       ((CMFXSTHH(1)+CMFXNOTT(1)-INCR1)/DCRATRCY)+CMFXSTCC(1);    0438 00506000
         AH    @14,CMFXSTHH(,@10)                                  0438 00507000
         BCTR  @14,0                                               0438 00508000
         ST    @15,@TF00001                                        0438 00509000
         SRDA  @14,32                                              0438 00510000
         D     @14,@TF00001                                        0438 00511000
         AH    @15,CMFXSTCC(,@10)                                  0438 00512000
         STH   @15,CMFXEDCC(,@10)                                  0438 00513000
*   CMFXEDHH(1)=                    /* COMPUTE AND SET ENDING TRACK  */ 00514000
*       (CMFXSTHH(1)+CMFXNOTT(1)-INCR1)//DCRATRCY;                 0439 00515000
         LH    @15,CMFXSTHH(,@10)                                  0439 00516000
         AH    @15,CMFXNOTT(,@10)                                  0439 00517000
         BCTR  @15,0                                               0439 00518000
         LR    @06,@15                                             0439 00519000
         SRDA  @06,32                                              0439 00520000
         D     @06,@TF00001                                        0439 00521000
         STH   @06,CMFXEDHH(,@10)                                  0439 00522000
*   CMFXHRBA(1)=DCRACHIA-INCR1;     /* SET ENDING RBA IN EXTENT      */ 00523000
         BCTR  @05,0                                               0440 00524000
         ST    @05,CMFXHRBA(,@10)                                  0440 00525000
*/********************************************************************/ 00526000
*/*     PREPARE THE CCA TO CALL MODIFY TO BUILD THE DATA RECORDS     */ 00527000
*/********************************************************************/ 00528000
*                                                                  0441 00529000
*   CCAF2NVC=ON;                    /* SET NO VALIDITY CHECK         */ 00530000
         OI    CCAF2NVC(R11),B'01000000'                           0441 00531000
*   CCAREUSE=ON;                    /* SET RAB'S REUSABLE            */ 00532000
         OI    CCAREUSE(R11),B'00000100'                           0442 00533000
*   CCARABB=ADDR(CCARAB1);          /* SET BASE RECORD RAB ADDRESS   */ 00534000
         LA    @10,CCARAB1(,R11)                                   0443 00535000
         ST    @10,CCARABB(,R11)                                   0443 00536000
*   CCARABF=CCARABB;                /* SET ADDR OF FIRST RAB TO USE  */ 00537000
         ST    @10,CCARABF(,R11)                                   0444 00538000
*   CCARABL=ADDR(CCARAB3);          /* SET ADDR OF LAST RAB TO USE   */ 00539000
         LA    @10,CCARAB3(,R11)                                   0445 00540000
         ST    @10,CCARABL(,R11)                                   0445 00541000
*   IF CCAF2CB=ON THEN              /* CALLER IS DEFINE CATALOG      */ 00542000
         TM    CCAF2CB(R11),B'00000010'                            0446 00543000
         BNO   @RF00446                                            0446 00544000
*     DO;                           /* NEED TO SAVE DEF CAT'S RAB    */ 00545000
*       DCRARAB3=CCARAB3;           /* SAVE RECORD AREA BLOCK 3      */ 00546000
         LA    @10,3472                                            0448 00547000
         ALR   @10,DCRAWAPR                                        0448 00548000
         MVC   DCRARAB3(20,@10),CCARAB3(R11)                       0448 00549000
*       DCRARA3(1)=                 /* SAVE RECORD AREA 3            */ 00550000
*           CCAR3REC->CATRECRD(1);                                 0449 00551000
         L     @05,CCAR3REC(,R11)                                  0449 00552000
         MVC   DCRARA3(256,@10),CATRECRD(@05)                      0449 00553000
*       DCRARA3(2)=                 /* SAVE RECORD AREA 3            */ 00554000
*           CCAR3REC->CATRECRD(2);                                 0450 00555000
         MVC   DCRARA3+256(256,@10),CATRECRD+256(@05)              0450 00556000
*     END;                          /* END 'DO' TO SAVE CATLG'S RAB  */ 00557000
*   ELSE                                                           0452 00558000
*     ;                             /* CALLER IS DEFINE SPACE        */ 00559000
*                                                                  0452 00560000
@RF00446 DS    0H                                                  0453 00561000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00562000
*   /*                                                               */ 00563000
*   /* CALL TO MODULE IGG0CLAV                                       */ 00564000
*   /*                                                               */ 00565000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00566000
*                                                                  0453 00567000
*Z013MOD:                                                          0453 00568000
*   CALL IGGPMOD;                   /* CALL MODIFY ROUTINE           */ 00569000
Z013MOD  L     @15,@CV04234                                        0453 00570000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0453 00571000
*/********************************************************************/ 00572000
*/*                  RESTORE  ESSENTIAL  VALUES                      */ 00573000
*/********************************************************************/ 00574000
*                                                                  0454 00575000
*   DCRAWAPR=CCACRACI;              /* RESTORE DEF CRA WORKAREA ADDR */ 00576000
         L     DCRAWAPR,CCACRACI(,R11)                             0454 00577000
*   IF CCAF2CB=ON THEN              /* CALLER IS DEFINE CATALOG      */ 00578000
         TM    CCAF2CB(R11),B'00000010'                            0455 00579000
         BNO   @RF00455                                            0455 00580000
*     DO;                           /* RESTORE DEFINE CATALOG'S RAB  */ 00581000
*       CCARAB3=DCRARAB3;           /* RESTORE RECORD AREA BLOCK 3   */ 00582000
         LA    @10,3472                                            0457 00583000
         ALR   @10,DCRAWAPR                                        0457 00584000
         MVC   CCARAB3(20,R11),DCRARAB3(@10)                       0457 00585000
*       CCAR3REC->CATRECRD(1)=DCRARA3(1);/* RESTORE RA 3             */ 00586000
         L     @05,CCAR3REC(,R11)                                  0458 00587000
         MVC   CATRECRD(256,@05),DCRARA3(@10)                      0458 00588000
*       CCAR3REC->CATRECRD(2)=DCRARA3(2);/* RESTORE RA 3             */ 00589000
         MVC   CATRECRD+256(256,@05),DCRARA3+256(@10)              0459 00590000
*     END;                          /* END 'DO' FOR CATLG RAB RESTORE*/ 00591000
*   ELSE                                                           0461 00592000
*     ;                             /* CALLER IS DEFINE SPACE        */ 00593000
@RF00455 DS    0H                                                  0462 00594000
*   CCAR2REC=DCRAR2PT;              /* RESTORE RA PTR IN RAB 2       */ 00595000
         MVC   CCAR2REC(4,R11),DCRAR2PT(DCRAWAPR)                  0462 00596000
*   CALL EXIT;                      /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 00597000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0463 00598000
*   GEN(DS 0F);                     /* FULLWORD BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT   */ 00599000
         DS 0F                                                          00600000
*   GEN(DC CL8'IGGPWCRA');          /* NAME OF FOLLOWING PROCEDURE   */ 00601000
         DC CL8'IGGPWCRA'                                               00602000
*   END;                            /* END OF INNER PROCEDURE        */ 00603000
@EL00003 DS    0H                                                  0466 00604000
@EF00003 DS    0H                                                  0466 00605000
@ER00003 BR    @14                                                 0466 00606000
@PB00003 DS    0H                                                  0467 00607000
*   GEN(EJECT);                     /* GO TO A NEW PRINT PAGE        */ 00608000
         EJECT                                                          00609000
*                                                                  0468 00610000
*/********************************************************************/ 00611000
*/*                                                                  */ 00612000
*/*        IGGPWCRA  -  PROCEDURE  EXTERNALLY  CALLED  NESTED        */ 00613000
*/*                                                                  */ 00614000
*/********************************************************************/ 00615000
*                                                                  0468 00616000
*IGGPWCRA:                                                         0468 00617000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);/* SPECIFY PROCEDURE OPTIONS     */ 00618000
         B     @PB00004                                            0468 00619000
IGGPWCRA DS    0H                                                  0469 00620000
*   GEN(ENTRY IGGPWCRA );           /* IDENTIFY ENTRY-POINT SYMBOL   */ 00621000
         ENTRY IGGPWCRA                                                 00622000
*Z014:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 00623000
*Z014WCRA:                          /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 00624000
*   RFY                                                            0470 00625000
*    (R5,                                                          0470 00626000
*     R6,                                                          0470 00627000
*     R7,                                                          0470 00628000
*     R8,                                                          0470 00629000
*     R9,                                                          0470 00630000
*     R10) UNRSTD;                  /* PL/S COMPILER WORK REGISTERS  */ 00631000
Z014     DS    0H                                                  0470 00632000
Z014WCRA DS    0H                                                  0471 00633000
*   RFY                                                            0471 00634000
*    (R2,                                                          0471 00635000
*     R3,                                                          0471 00636000
*     R4) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT LOCAL WORK REGISTERS */ 00637000
*   GEN(STM 12,14,12(13));          /* SAVE REGISTERS OF CALLER      */ 00638000
         STM 12,14,12(13)                                               00639000
*   GEN(LA 13,12(13));              /* POINT TO NEXT SAVE AREA       */ 00640000
         LA 13,12(13)                                                   00641000
*   GEN(BALR 12,0);                 /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY      */ 00642000
         BALR 12,0                                                      00643000
*   GEN(LA 15,*-IGGSEGST(0,0));     /* COMPUTE MODULE BASE           */ 00644000
         LA 15,*-IGGSEGST(0,0)                                          00645000
*   GEN(SR 12,15);                  /* SET BASE TO MODULE BASE       */ 00646000
         SR 12,15                                                       00647000
*/********************************************************************* 00648000
**                                                                    * 00649000
**   PROCEDURE NAME = IGGPWCRA                                        * 00650000
**                                                                    * 00651000
**   PROCEDURE TYPE = EXTERNALLY CALLED, NESTED                       * 00652000
**                                                                    * 00653000
**   DESCRIPTIVE NAME = WRITE RECORDS TO CRA                          * 00654000
**                                                                    * 00655000
**   FUNCTION =                                                       * 00656000
**      THIS PROCEDURE IS CALLED BY THE DEFINE CRA MODULE (IGG0CLB4)  * 00657000
**      IN ORDER TO WRITE THE CRA SELF-DESCRIBING RECORDS AND THE     * 00658000
**      VOLUME RECORDS INTO THE CRA:                                  * 00659000
**      1.  WRITE CRA SELF-DESCRIBING CI'S 0-5 INTO THE CRA           * 00660000
**      2.  WRITE CI'S 6-8 (FREE RECORDS) INTO THE CRA                * 00661000
**      3.  WRITE VOLUME BASE AND EXTENSION RECORDS INTO THE CRA      * 00662000
**                                                                    * 00663000
**   INPUT =                                                          * 00664000
**      ADDRESS OF CCA IN REGISTER 11                                 * 00665000
**      ADDRESS OF DEFINE CRA WORKAREA IN DCRAWAPR (REGISTER 3)       * 00666000
**                                                                    * 00667000
**   OUTPUT =                                                         * 00668000
**      IF ERROR ENCOUNTERED, 'CCAPROB' CONTAINS PROBLEM              * 00669000
**         DETERMINATION INFORMATION FROM CRA I/O ROUTINE IGGPXRIO.   * 00670000
**      RECORDS WRITTEN TO THE CRA ON THE VOLUME.                     * 00671000
**                                                                    * 00672000
**********************************************************************/ 00673000
*/********************************************************************/ 00674000
*/*         WRITE CRA SELF-DESCRIBING CI'S 0-5 INTO THE CRA          */ 00675000
*/********************************************************************/ 00676000
*                                                                  0477 00677000
*   DO DCRARCTR=0 TO 5              /* PUT CI'S 0-5 INTO THE CRA     */ 00678000
*         WHILE(CCACD1=RCS);        /* DO IF ALL IS OKAY             */ 00679000
         SLR   DCRARCTR,DCRARCTR                                   0477 00680000
@DL00477 CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0477 00681000
         BNE   @DC00477                                            0477 00682000
*     CCARARBA=DCRARCTR;            /* SET CI NO. FOR IGGPXRIO       */ 00683000
         ST    DCRARCTR,CCARARBA(,R11)                             0478 00684000
*     CCARAREC=DCRACIPT(DCRARCTR+INCR1);/* POINT TO RECORD TO PUT    */ 00685000
*                                                                  0479 00686000
         LR    @10,DCRARCTR                                        0479 00687000
         SLA   @10,2                                               0479 00688000
         L     @10,DCRACIPT(@10,DCRAWAPR)                          0479 00689000
         ST    @10,CCARAREC(,R11)                                  0479 00690000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00691000
*     /*                                                             */ 00692000
*     /* CALL TO MODULE IGG0CLBO                                     */ 00693000
*     /*                                                             */ 00694000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00695000
*                                                                  0480 00696000
*Z015XRIO:                                                         0480 00697000
*     CALL IGGPXRIO;                /* PUT A CI INTO THE CRA         */ 00698000
Z015XRIO L     @15,@CV04237                                        0480 00699000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0480 00700000
*     DCRAWAPR=CCACRACI;            /* RESTORE DEF CRA WORKAREA ADDR */ 00701000
         L     DCRAWAPR,CCACRACI(,R11)                             0481 00702000
*   END;                            /* END 'DO-WHILE' TO WRITE CI'S  */ 00703000
         AH    DCRARCTR,@CH00037                                   0482 00704000
         CH    DCRARCTR,@CH00053                                   0482 00705000
         BNH   @DL00477                                            0482 00706000
@DC00477 DS    0H                                                  0483 00707000
*/********************************************************************/ 00708000
*/*         WRITE CI'S 6-8  -  TYPE 'F': EMPTY FREE RECORDS          */ 00709000
*/********************************************************************/ 00710000
*                                                                  0483 00711000
*   IF CCACD1=RCS THEN              /* IGGPXRIO SUCCESSFUL SO FAR    */ 00712000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0483 00713000
         BNE   @RF00483                                            0483 00714000
*     DO;                           /* WRITE FREE RECORDS 6, 7, 8    */ 00715000
*       RFY                                                        0485 00716000
*         CATRCD BASED(R2);         /* SPECIFY REG 2 AS BASE FOR REC */ 00717000
*       R2=DCRACIPT(2);             /* POINT TO A FREE RECORD (CI 1) */ 00718000
         L     R2,DCRACIPT+4(,DCRAWAPR)                            0486 00719000
*       CCARAREC=R2;                /* POINT TO A FREE RECORD        */ 00720000
         ST    R2,CCARAREC(,R11)                                   0487 00721000
*       DO DCRARCTR=6 TO 8          /* SET CI PROCESSING RANGE       */ 00722000
*             WHILE(CCACD1=RCS);    /* CONTINUE IF ALL IS OKAY       */ 00723000
         LA    DCRARCTR,6                                          0488 00724000
@DL00488 CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0488 00725000
         BNE   @DC00488                                            0488 00726000
*         RCDCINO=DCRARCTR;         /* SET RECORD CI NUMBER          */ 00727000
         STCM  DCRARCTR,7,RCDCINO(R2)                              0489 00728000
*         CCARARBA=DCRARCTR;        /* SET CI NUMBER FOR IGGPXRIO    */ 00729000
*                                                                  0490 00730000
         ST    DCRARCTR,CCARARBA(,R11)                             0490 00731000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00732000
*         /*                                                         */ 00733000
*         /* CALL TO MODULE IGG0CLBO                                 */ 00734000
*         /*                                                         */ 00735000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00736000
*                                                                  0491 00737000
*Z016XRIO:                                                         0491 00738000
*         CALL IGGPXRIO;            /* PUT TYPE 'F' RECORD INTO CRA  */ 00739000
Z016XRIO L     @15,@CV04237                                        0491 00740000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0491 00741000
*         DCRAWAPR=CCACRACI;        /* RESTORE DEF CRA WORKAREA ADDR */ 00742000
         L     DCRAWAPR,CCACRACI(,R11)                             0492 00743000
*       END;                        /* END 'DO-WHILE' TO WRITE CI'S  */ 00744000
         AH    DCRARCTR,@CH00037                                   0493 00745000
         CH    DCRARCTR,@CH00042                                   0493 00746000
         BNH   @DL00488                                            0493 00747000
@DC00488 DS    0H                                                  0494 00748000
*     END;                          /* END 'DO' TO WRITE CI'S 6-8    */ 00749000
*   ELSE                                                           0495 00750000
*     ;                             /* I/O FOR CI'S 0-5 FAILED       */ 00751000
@RF00483 DS    0H                                                  0496 00752000
*   IF CCACD1¬=RCS THEN             /* IF CRA I/O FAILED             */ 00753000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0496 00754000
         BE    @RF00496                                            0496 00755000
*     CALL EXIT;                    /* DO NOT PROCEED ANY FARTHER    */ 00756000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0497 00757000
*   ELSE                                                           0498 00758000
*     ;                             /* CRA I/O SUCCESSFUL            */ 00759000
@RF00496 DS    0H                                                  0499 00760000
*/********************************************************************/ 00761000
*/*       THE CASE IS DEFINE CATALOG:  WRITE VOLUME BASE AND         */ 00762000
*/*       EXTENSION RECORDS INTO THE CRA.                            */ 00763000
*/********************************************************************/ 00764000
*                                                                  0499 00765000
*   PROCESS=GO;                     /* SET LOOP CONTROL VARIABLE     */ 00766000
         L     @10,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0499 00767000
         MVC   PROCESS(2,@10),@CC04183                             0499 00768000
*   RFY                                                            0500 00769000
*     CATRCD BASED(CCARAREC);       /* SPECIFY RECORD BASE           */ 00770000
*   IF CCAF2CB=ON THEN              /* CALLER IS DEFINE CATALOG      */ 00771000
         TM    CCAF2CB(R11),B'00000010'                            0501 00772000
         BNO   @RF00501                                            0501 00773000
*     DO;                           /* WRITE CI'S 9+ FROM CORE       */ 00774000
*       CCARAREC=CMSCTREC(10);      /* POINT IGGPXRIO TO BASE VOLUME    00775000
*                                      RECORD                        */ 00776000
         MVC   CCARAREC(4,R11),CMSCTREC+36(@10)                    0503 00777000
*       DO DCRARCTR=11 BY 1         /* SET CMSCTREC(*) SUBSCRIPT     */ 00778000
*             WHILE(PROCESS=GO);    /* PROCEED UNTIL HALTED          */ 00779000
         LA    DCRARCTR,11                                         0504 00780000
         B     @DE00504                                            0504 00781000
@DL00504 DS    0H                                                  0505 00782000
*         CCARARBA=                 /* SET CRA CI NO. FOR IGGPXRIO   */ 00783000
*             DCRARCTR-INCR2;                                      0505 00784000
         LR    @10,DCRARCTR                                        0505 00785000
         BCTR  @10,0                                               0505 00786000
         BCTR  @10,0                                               0505 00787000
         ST    @10,CCARARBA(,R11)                                  0505 00788000
*         RCDRELID=CURELID;         /* SET CURRENT RELEASE NUMBER    */ 00789000
         L     @05,CCARAREC(,R11)                                  0506 00790000
         MVI   RCDRELID(@05),X'01'                                 0506 00791000
*         RCDCRACI=CCARARBA;        /* SET CRA CI NO. IN RECORD      */ 00792000
         STCM  @10,7,RCDCRACI(@05)                                 0507 00793000
*         RCDRACTS=CMWASTOR(1:4);   /* SET CRA CREATE TIME STAMP     */ 00794000
*                                                                  0508 00795000
         L     @10,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0508 00796000
         MVC   RCDRACTS(4,@05),CMWASTOR(@10)                       0508 00797000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00798000
*         /*                                                         */ 00799000
*         /* CALL TO MODULE IGG0CLBO                                 */ 00800000
*         /*                                                         */ 00801000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00802000
*                                                                  0509 00803000
*Z017XRIO:                                                         0509 00804000
*         CALL IGGPXRIO;            /* WRITE RECORD TO CRA           */ 00805000
Z017XRIO L     @15,@CV04237                                        0509 00806000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0509 00807000
*         DCRAWAPR=CCACRACI;        /* RESTORE DEF CRA WORKAREA ADDR */ 00808000
         L     DCRAWAPR,CCACRACI(,R11)                             0510 00809000
*         IF CCACD1=RCS THEN        /* CHECK IF I/O SUCCESSFUL       */ 00810000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0511 00811000
         BNE   @RF00511                                            0511 00812000
*           DO;                     /* DO FOR SUCCESSFUL I/O         */ 00813000
*             CCARAREC=             /* POINT XRIO TO NEXT RECORD     */ 00814000
*                 CMSCTREC(DCRARCTR);                              0513 00815000
         LR    @10,DCRARCTR                                        0513 00816000
         SLA   @10,2                                               0513 00817000
         L     @05,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0513 00818000
         L     @10,CMSCTREC-4(@10,@05)                             0513 00819000
         ST    @10,CCARAREC(,R11)                                  0513 00820000
*             IF RCDID¬=VOLEXTID THEN/* IF NOT EXTENSION REC         */ 00821000
         CLI   RCDID(@10),C'W'                                     0514 00822000
         BE    @RF00514                                            0514 00823000
*               PROCESS=STOP;       /* THEN HALT PUTS                */ 00824000
         MVC   PROCESS(2,@05),@CC04181                             0515 00825000
*             ELSE                                                 0516 00826000
*               ;                   /* ANOTHER VOLUME EXTENSION    0516 00827000
*                                      RECORD                        */ 00828000
@RF00514 DS    0H                                                  0517 00829000
*           END;                    /* END 'DO' FOR SUCCESSFUL I/O   */ 00830000
*         ELSE                      /* IGGPXIO ROUTINE UNSUCCESSFUL  */ 00831000
*           PROCESS=STOP;           /* SET HALT LOOP INDICATOR       */ 00832000
         B     @RC00511                                            0518 00833000
@RF00511 L     @10,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0518 00834000
         MVC   PROCESS(2,@10),@CC04181                             0518 00835000
*       END;                        /* END 'DO-WHILE' TO WRITE     0519 00836000
*                                      RECORDS                       */ 00837000
@RC00511 AH    DCRARCTR,@CH00037                                   0519 00838000
@DE00504 L     @10,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0519 00839000
         CLC   PROCESS(2,@10),@CC04183                             0519 00840000
         BE    @DL00504                                            0519 00841000
*     END;                          /* END 'DO' FOR CALLER DEF CATLG */ 00842000
*/********************************************************************/ 00843000
*/*        THE CASE IS DEFINE SPACE:  WRITE VOLUME BASE AND          */ 00844000
*/*        EXTENSION RECORDS INTO THE CRA.                           */ 00845000
*/********************************************************************/ 00846000
*                                                                  0521 00847000
*   ELSE                            /* FOR DEFINE SPACE, CANDIDATE,  */ 00848000
*     DO;                           /* OR UNIQUE                     */ 00849000
         B     @RC00501                                            0521 00850000
@RF00501 DS    0H                                                  0522 00851000
*       CCARAREC=CCARAVCA(1);       /* POINT XRIO TO BASE VOL RECRD  */ 00852000
         MVC   CCARAREC(4,R11),CCARAVCA(R11)                       0522 00853000
*       RFY                                                        0523 00854000
*         BUFVOLRD BASED(CCARAREC); /* MAP BUFFERED VOL RECRD        */ 00855000
*       DO DCRARCTR=9 BY 1          /* START WITH CI 9               */ 00856000
*             WHILE(PROCESS=GO);    /* PROCEED UNTIL HALTED          */ 00857000
         LA    DCRARCTR,9                                          0524 00858000
         B     @DE00524                                            0524 00859000
@DL00524 DS    0H                                                  0525 00860000
*         CCARARBA=DCRARCTR;        /* SET CRA CI NO. FOR IGGPXRIO   */ 00861000
         ST    DCRARCTR,CCARARBA(,R11)                             0525 00862000
*         CCARALSA=BUFNEXTB;        /* SAVE PTR TO NEXT RECRD ON CHN */ 00863000
         L     @10,CCARAREC(,R11)                                  0526 00864000
         MVC   CCARALSA(4,R11),BUFNEXTB(@10)                       0526 00865000
*         RCDRELID=CURELID;         /* SET CURRENT RELEASE INDICATOR */ 00866000
         MVI   RCDRELID(@10),X'01'                                 0527 00867000
*         RCDCRACI=CCARARBA;        /* SET CRA CI NUMBER IN RECORD   */ 00868000
         L     @05,CCARARBA(,R11)                                  0528 00869000
         STCM  @05,7,RCDCRACI(@10)                                 0528 00870000
*         RCDRACTS=CMWASTOR(1:4);   /* SET CRA CREATE TIME STAMP     */ 00871000
*                                                                  0529 00872000
         L     @05,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0529 00873000
         MVC   RCDRACTS(4,@10),CMWASTOR(@05)                       0529 00874000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00875000
*         /*                                                         */ 00876000
*         /* CALL TO MODULE IGG0CLBO                                 */ 00877000
*         /*                                                         */ 00878000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00879000
*                                                                  0530 00880000
*Z018XRIO:                                                         0530 00881000
*         CALL IGGPXRIO;            /* WRITE A CI TO THE CRA         */ 00882000
Z018XRIO L     @15,@CV04237                                        0530 00883000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0530 00884000
*         DCRAWAPR=CCACRACI;        /* RESTORE DEF CRA WORKAREA ADDR */ 00885000
         L     DCRAWAPR,CCACRACI(,R11)                             0531 00886000
*         BUFNEXTB=CCARALSA;        /* RESTORE PTR TO NEXT RECORD    */ 00887000
         L     @10,CCARAREC(,R11)                                  0532 00888000
         L     @05,CCARALSA(,R11)                                  0532 00889000
         ST    @05,BUFNEXTB(,@10)                                  0532 00890000
*         CCARAREC=CCARALSA;        /* POINT TO NEXT RECORD ON CHAIN */ 00891000
         ST    @05,CCARAREC(,R11)                                  0533 00892000
*         IF(CCACD1¬=RCS)|          /* IGGPXRIO FAILED               */ 00893000
*             (CCARAREC=BLANK) THEN /* END OF RECORD CHAIN           */ 00894000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0534 00895000
         BNE   @RT00534                                            0534 00896000
         LTR   @05,@05                                             0534 00897000
         BNZ   @RF00534                                            0534 00898000
@RT00534 DS    0H                                                  0535 00899000
*           PROCESS=STOP;           /* SET HALT LOOP VARIABLE        */ 00900000
         L     @10,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0535 00901000
         MVC   PROCESS(2,@10),@CC04181                             0535 00902000
*         ELSE                                                     0536 00903000
*           ;                       /* OKAY TO PROCESS ANOTHER RECORD*/ 00904000
@RF00534 DS    0H                                                  0537 00905000
*       END;                        /* END 'DO-WHILE' TO WRITE     0537 00906000
*                                      RECORDS                       */ 00907000
         AH    DCRARCTR,@CH00037                                   0537 00908000
@DE00524 L     @10,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0537 00909000
         CLC   PROCESS(2,@10),@CC04183                             0537 00910000
         BE    @DL00524                                            0537 00911000
*     END;                          /* END 'DO' FOR DEF SPACE CALLER */ 00912000
*   CALL EXIT;                      /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 00913000
@RC00501 BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0539 00914000
*   GEN(DS 0F);                     /* FULLWORD BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT   */ 00915000
         DS 0F                                                          00916000
*   GEN(DC CL8'IGGPWCAT');          /* NAME OF FOLLOWING PROCEDURE   */ 00917000
         DC CL8'IGGPWCAT'                                               00918000
*   END;                            /* END OF INNER PROCEDURE        */ 00919000
@EL00004 DS    0H                                                  0542 00920000
@EF00004 DS    0H                                                  0542 00921000
@ER00004 BR    @14                                                 0542 00922000
@PB00004 DS    0H                                                  0543 00923000
*   GEN(EJECT);                     /* GO TO A NEW PRINT PAGE        */ 00924000
         EJECT                                                          00925000
*                                                                  0544 00926000
*/********************************************************************/ 00927000
*/*                                                                  */ 00928000
*/*        IGGPWCAT  -  PROCEDURE  EXTERNALLY  CALLED  NESTED        */ 00929000
*/*                                                                  */ 00930000
*/********************************************************************/ 00931000
*                                                                  0544 00932000
*IGGPWCAT:                                                         0544 00933000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);/* SPECIFY PROCEDURE OPTIONS     */ 00934000
         B     @PB00005                                            0544 00935000
IGGPWCAT DS    0H                                                  0545 00936000
*   GEN(ENTRY IGGPWCAT );           /* IDENTIFY ENTRY-POINT SYMBOL   */ 00937000
         ENTRY IGGPWCAT                                                 00938000
*Z019:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 00939000
*Z019WCAT:                          /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 00940000
*   RFY                                                            0546 00941000
*    (R5,                                                          0546 00942000
*     R6,                                                          0546 00943000
*     R7,                                                          0546 00944000
*     R8,                                                          0546 00945000
*     R9,                                                          0546 00946000
*     R10) UNRSTD;                  /* PL/S COMPILER WORK REGISTERS  */ 00947000
Z019     DS    0H                                                  0546 00948000
Z019WCAT DS    0H                                                  0547 00949000
*   RFY                                                            0547 00950000
*    (R2,                                                          0547 00951000
*     R3,                                                          0547 00952000
*     R4) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT LOCAL WORK REGISTERS */ 00953000
*   GEN(STM 12,14,12(13));          /* SAVE REGISTERS OF CALLER      */ 00954000
         STM 12,14,12(13)                                               00955000
*   GEN(LA 13,12(13));              /* POINT TO NEXT SAVE AREA       */ 00956000
         LA 13,12(13)                                                   00957000
*   GEN(BALR 12,0);                 /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY      */ 00958000
         BALR 12,0                                                      00959000
*   GEN(LA 15,*-IGGSEGST(0,0));     /* COMPUTE MODULE BASE           */ 00960000
         LA 15,*-IGGSEGST(0,0)                                          00961000
*   GEN(SR 12,15);                  /* SET BASE TO MODULE BASE       */ 00962000
         SR 12,15                                                       00963000
*/********************************************************************* 00964000
**                                                                    * 00965000
**   PROCEDURE NAME = IGGPWCAT                                        * 00966000
**                                                                    * 00967000
**   PROCEDURE TYPE = EXTERNALLY CALLED, NESTED                       * 00968000
**                                                                    * 00969000
**   DESCRIPTIVE NAME = WRITE VOLUME RECORDS TO CATALOG               * 00970000
**                                                                    * 00971000
**   FUNCTION =                                                       * 00972000
**      THIS PROCEDURE IS CALLED BY THE DEFINE CRA MODULE (IGG0CLB4)  * 00973000
**      IN ORDER TO WRITE THE BUFFERED VOLUME RECORDS INTO THE        * 00974000
**      CATALOG AND TO FREE THE MAIN STORAGE SPACE OCCUPIED BY        * 00975000
**      THOSE RECORDS (THE CASE IS DEFINE SPACE IF THIS PROCEDURE     * 00976000
**      IS CALLED).                                                   * 00977000
**                                                                    * 00978000
**   INPUT =                                                          * 00979000
**      ADDRESS OF CCA IN REGISTER 11.                                * 00980000
**      ADDRESS OF DEFINE CRA WORKAREA IN DCRAWAPR (REGISTER 3).      * 00981000
**      'CCARAVCA(1)' POINTS TO THE FIRST VOLUME RECORD IN THE        * 00982000
**         CHAIN OF BUFFERED VOLUME RECORDS.                          * 00983000
**                                                                    * 00984000
**   OUTPUT =                                                         * 00985000
**      IF ERROR ENCOUNTERED, 'CCAPROB' CONTAINS PROBLEM              * 00986000
**         DETERMINATION INFORMATION FROM CATALOG I/O ROUTINE         * 00987000
**         IGGPPAD.                                                   * 00988000
**      VOLUME RECORDS WRITTEN TO THE CATALOG.                        * 00989000
**                                                                    * 00990000
**********************************************************************/ 00991000
*                                                                  0553 00992000
*   RFY                                                            0553 00993000
*     BUFVOLRD BASED(CCACPE1);      /* MAP BUFFERED VOLUME RECORD    */ 00994000
*   CCAVBUFI=OFF;                   /* TURN OFF VOLUME BUFFER FLAG   */ 00995000
*   CCASCRA=ON;                     /* SUPPRESS CRA UPDATES          */ 00996000
         OI    CCASCRA(R11),B'00100000'                            0555 00997000
         NI    CCAVBUFI(R11),B'10111111'                           0555 00998000
*   CCAURAB=ADDR(CCARAB1);          /* TELL IGGPXIO TO USE RAB 1     */ 00999000
         LA    @10,CCARAB1(,R11)                                   0556 01000000
         ST    @10,CCAURAB(,R11)                                   0556 01001000
*   CCACPE1=CCARAVCA(1);            /* POINT TO BASE VOLUME RECORD   */ 01002000
         L     @05,CCARAVCA(,R11)                                  0557 01003000
         ST    @05,CCACPE1(,@10)                                   0557 01004000
*   CCACPE1=BUFNEXTB;               /* POINT TO FIRST EXTENSION RECRD*/ 01005000
         L     @05,BUFNEXTB(,@05)                                  0558 01006000
         ST    @05,CCACPE1(,@10)                                   0558 01007000
*   PROCESS=GO;                     /* SET LOOP CONTROL VARIABLE     */ 01008000
         L     @10,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0559 01009000
         MVC   PROCESS(2,@10),@CC04183                             0559 01010000
*   CCACRABU=OFF;                   /* TURN OFF CRA BUILD INDICATOR     01011000
*                                      TO PERMIT PUT-ADD'S TO CATALOG*/ 01012000
         NI    CCACRABU(R11),B'11111110'                           0560 01013000
*   DO DCRARCTR=1 BY 1              /* SET LOOP CONTROL VARIABLE     */ 01014000
*         WHILE(PROCESS=GO);        /* PROCEED UNTIL HALTED          */ 01015000
         LA    DCRARCTR,1                                          0561 01016000
         B     @DE00561                                            0561 01017000
@DL00561 DS    0H                                                  0562 01018000
*     CCARALSA=BUFNEXTB;            /* SAVE PTR TO NEXT RECRD ON CHN */ 01019000
         L     @10,CCAURAB(,R11)                                   0562 01020000
         L     @10,CCACPE1(,@10)                                   0562 01021000
         MVC   CCARALSA(4,R11),BUFNEXTB(@10)                       0562 01022000
*     DO;                                                          0563 01023000
*                                                                  0563 01024000
*       /*************************************************************/ 01025000
*       /*                                                           */ 01026000
*       /* CALL TO MODULE IGG0CLAG                                   */ 01027000
*       /*                                                           */ 01028000
*       /*************************************************************/ 01029000
*                                                                  0564 01030000
*Z021PAD:                                                          0564 01031000
*       CALL IGGPPAD;               /* PUT-ADD RECORD                */ 01032000
Z021PAD  L     @15,@CV04235                                        0564 01033000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0564 01034000
*     END;                          /* PUT-ADD A RECORD TO THE CATLG */ 01035000
*     IF CCACD1=RCS THEN            /* CHECK IF I/O SUCCESSFUL       */ 01036000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0566 01037000
         BNE   @RF00566                                            0566 01038000
*       DO;                         /* FREE VOL RECORD JUST WRITTEN  */ 01039000
*         CCAMNLEN=LENGTH(BUFVOLRD);/* SET LENGTH OF RECORD          */ 01040000
         MVC   CCAMNLEN(3,R11),@CF01041+1                          0568 01041000
*         CCAMNADR=CCACPE1;         /* SET ADDRESS OF CURRENT RECORD */ 01042000
         L     @10,CCAURAB(,R11)                                   0569 01043000
         MVC   CCAMNADR(4,R11),CCACPE1(@10)                        0569 01044000
*         RFY                                                      0570 01045000
*           R1 RSTD;                /* NEED R1 FOR FREEMAIN MACRO    */ 01046000
*         R1=ADDR(CCAMSSPL);        /* POINT TO STRG MGMT P.L.       */ 01047000
         LA    R1,CCAMSSPL(,R11)                                   0571 01048000
*         CCAMNSPL=USUBPOOL;        /* STORE SUBPOOL VALUE           */ 01049000
         MVI   CCAMNSPL(R11),X'FC'                                 0572 01050000
*         DO;                                                      0573 01051000
*           IF MNATFULL=ON THEN     /* TRACKING TABLE FULL           */ 01052000
*                                                                  0574 01053000
         TM    MNATFULL(R11),B'10000000'                           0574 01054000
         BNO   @RF00574                                            0574 01055000
*             /*******************************************************/ 01056000
*             /*                                                     */ 01057000
*             /* CALL TO MODULE IGG0CLAT                             */ 01058000
*             /*                                                     */ 01059000
*             /*******************************************************/ 01060000
*                                                                  0575 01061000
*Z024ARFS:                                                         0575 01062000
*             CALL IGGPARFS;        /* YES,CALL SPILL ROUTINE        */ 01063000
Z024ARFS L     @15,@CV04230                                        0575 01064000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0575 01065000
*           GEN REFS(CCAMNAT)(MVC CCAMNAT(248,11),CCAMNAT+8(11));/*     01066000
*                                      PUSH AND TRACK                */ 01067000
@RF00574 DS    0H                                                  0576 01068000
         MVC CCAMNAT(248,11),CCAMNAT+8(11)                              01069000
*         END;                                                     0577 01070000
*                                                                  0577 01071000
*         /***********************************************************/ 01072000
*         /*                                                         */ 01073000
*         /* RELEASE MAIN STORAGE FROM USER SUBPOOL 252              */ 01074000
*         /*                                                         */ 01075000
*         /***********************************************************/ 01076000
*                                                                  0578 01077000
*         GEN(FREEMAIN L,MF=(E,(1))) ;/* FREE STORAGE AREA           */ 01078000
         FREEMAIN L,MF=(E,(1))                                          01079000
*         RFY                                                      0579 01080000
*           R1 UNRSTD;              /* FREE USE OF R1                */ 01081000
*         IF CCARALSA=BLANK THEN    /* IF END OF RECORD CHAIN,       */ 01082000
         ICM   @10,15,CCARALSA(R11)                                0580 01083000
         BNZ   @RF00580                                            0580 01084000
*           PROCESS=STOP;           /* SET 'HALT' TO PUT-ADD PROCESS */ 01085000
         L     @01,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0581 01086000
         MVC   PROCESS(2,@01),@CC04181                             0581 01087000
*         ELSE                      /* ANOTHER RECORD EXISTS ON CHAIN*/ 01088000
*           CCACPE1=CCARALSA;       /* POINT RAB TO NEXT RECORD      */ 01089000
         B     @RC00580                                            0582 01090000
@RF00580 L     @01,CCAURAB(,R11)                                   0582 01091000
         MVC   CCACPE1(4,@01),CCARALSA(R11)                        0582 01092000
*       END;                        /* END 'DO' TO FREE VOL RECORD   */ 01093000
*     ELSE                          /* FOR NO MORE EXTENSION RECORDS,*/ 01094000
*       PROCESS=STOP;               /* SET HALT LOOP INDICATOR       */ 01095000
         B     @RC00566                                            0584 01096000
@RF00566 L     @01,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0584 01097000
         MVC   PROCESS(2,@01),@CC04181                             0584 01098000
*   END;                            /* END 'DO-WHILE' TO WRITE AND 0585 01099000
*                                      FREE VOLUME RECORDS           */ 01100000
@RC00566 AH    DCRARCTR,@CH00037                                   0585 01101000
@DE00561 L     @10,CCACMSWA(,R11)                                  0585 01102000
         CLC   PROCESS(2,@10),@CC04183                             0585 01103000
         BE    @DL00561                                            0585 01104000
*   IF CCACD1=RCS THEN              /* ALL I/O SUCCESSFUL SO FAR     */ 01105000
         CLI   CCACD1(R11),0                                       0586 01106000
         BNE   @RF00586                                            0586 01107000
*     DO;                           /* WRITE THE BASE VOLUME RECORD  */ 01108000
*       CCACPE1=CCARAVCA(1);        /* POINT TO BASE VOLUME RECORD   */ 01109000
         L     @01,CCAURAB(,R11)                                   0588 01110000
         MVC   CCACPE1(4,@01),CCARAVCA(R11)                        0588 01111000
*       DO;                                                        0589 01112000
*                                                                  0589 01113000
*         /***********************************************************/ 01114000
*         /*                                                         */ 01115000
*         /* CALL TO MODULE IGG0CLAG                                 */ 01116000
*         /*                                                         */ 01117000
*         /***********************************************************/ 01118000
*                                                                  0590 01119000
*Z026PAD:                                                          0590 01120000
*         CALL IGGPPAD;             /* PUT-ADD RECORD                */ 01121000
Z026PAD  L     @15,@CV04235                                        0590 01122000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0590 01123000
*       END;                        /* WRITE BASE VOL REC TO CATALOG */ 01124000
*       CCAMNLEN=LENGTH(BUFVOLRD);  /* SET LENG OF CORE TO FREE      */ 01125000
         MVC   CCAMNLEN(3,R11),@CF01041+1                          0592 01126000
*       CCAMNADR=CCARAVCA(1);       /* SET ADDRESS OF CORE TO FREE   */ 01127000
         MVC   CCAMNADR(4,R11),CCARAVCA(R11)                       0593 01128000
*       RFY                                                        0594 01129000
*         R1 RSTD;                  /* NEED R1 FOR FREEMAIN MACRO    */ 01130000
*       R1=ADDR(CCAMSSPL);          /* POINT TO STRG MGMT P.L.       */ 01131000
         LA    R1,CCAMSSPL(,R11)                                   0595 01132000
*       CCAMNSPL=USUBPOOL;          /* STORE SUBPOOL VALUE           */ 01133000
         MVI   CCAMNSPL(R11),X'FC'                                 0596 01134000
*       DO;                                                        0597 01135000
*         IF MNATFULL=ON THEN       /* TRACKING TABLE FULL           */ 01136000
*                                                                  0598 01137000
         TM    MNATFULL(R11),B'10000000'                           0598 01138000
         BNO   @RF00598                                            0598 01139000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01140000
*           /*                                                       */ 01141000
*           /* CALL TO MODULE IGG0CLAT                               */ 01142000
*           /*                                                       */ 01143000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01144000
*                                                                  0599 01145000
*Z029ARFS:                                                         0599 01146000
*           CALL IGGPARFS;          /* YES,CALL SPILL ROUTINE        */ 01147000
Z029ARFS L     @15,@CV04230                                        0599 01148000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0599 01149000
*         GEN REFS(CCAMNAT)(MVC CCAMNAT(248,11),CCAMNAT+8(11));/*  0600 01150000
*                                      PUSH AND TRACK                */ 01151000
@RF00598 DS    0H                                                  0600 01152000
         MVC CCAMNAT(248,11),CCAMNAT+8(11)                              01153000
*       END;                                                       0601 01154000
*                                                                  0601 01155000
*       /*************************************************************/ 01156000
*       /*                                                           */ 01157000
*       /* RELEASE MAIN STORAGE FROM USER SUBPOOL 252                */ 01158000
*       /*                                                           */ 01159000
*       /*************************************************************/ 01160000
*                                                                  0602 01161000
*       GEN(FREEMAIN L,MF=(E,(1))) ;/* FREE BASE VOLUME RECORD       */ 01162000
         FREEMAIN L,MF=(E,(1))                                          01163000
*       RFY                                                        0603 01164000
*         R1 UNRSTD;                /* FREE USE OF REG 1             */ 01165000
*     END;                          /* END 'DO' TO WRITE BASE VOL REC*/ 01166000
*   ELSE                                                           0605 01167000
*     ;                             /* AN I/O FUNCTION FAILED        */ 01168000
@RF00586 DS    0H                                                  0606 01169000
*   CCASCRA=OFF;                    /* PERMIT FUTURE CRA UPDATES     */ 01170000
         NI    CCASCRA(R11),B'11011111'                            0606 01171000
*   CCARAVCA(1)=BLANK;              /* CLEAR RECORD CHAIN START ADDR */ 01172000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0607 01173000
         ST    @10,CCARAVCA(,R11)                                  0607 01174000
*   CCARAVCA(2)=BLANK;              /* CLEAR RECORD CHAIN END ADDR   */ 01175000
         ST    @10,CCARAVCA+4(,R11)                                0608 01176000
*   DCRAWAPR=CCACRACI;              /* RESTORE DEF CRA WORKAREA ADDR */ 01177000
         L     DCRAWAPR,CCACRACI(,R11)                             0609 01178000
*   CALL EXIT;                      /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 01179000
         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0610 01180000
*   END;                            /* END OF INNER PROCEDURE        */ 01181000
@EL00005 DS    0H                                                  0611 01182000
@EF00005 DS    0H                                                  0611 01183000
@ER00005 BR    @14                                                 0611 01184000
@PB00005 DS    0H                                                  0612 01185000
*   GEN(EJECT);                     /* GO TO A NEW PRINT PAGE        */ 01186000
         EJECT                                                          01187000
*                                                                  0613 01188000
*/********************************************************************/ 01189000
*/*                                                                  */ 01190000
*/*         RETURN-TO-CALLER  PROCEDURE-EXITING  SUBFUNCTION         */ 01191000
*/*                                                                  */ 01192000
*/********************************************************************/ 01193000
*                                                                  0613 01194000
*EXIT:                                                             0613 01195000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);/* SPECIFY PROCEDURE OPTIONS     */ 01196000
         B     @PB00006                                            0613 01197000

*   GEN(LM 12,14,0(13));            /* RESTORE REGISTERS OF CALLER   */ 01199000

*   GEN(MVI 12(13),255);            /* MARK END OF PDL               */ 01201000
