         END   IGG0CLDA,(C'PLS0454',0602,74345)                         04904000
./  ADD  SSI=80600592,NAME=IGG0CLDC
         TITLE 'IGG0CLDC - RACF EXTENDED SECURITY CHECKING             *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IGG0CLDC CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IGG0CLDC  78.060'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  DS    0H                                                  0002 00010000
         USING @MAINENT,@15                                             00011000
         USING @DATD-(CCATEMPS-IGGCCA),R11                              00012000
         DS 0F                                                          00013000
         DC CL8'IGGPRACT'                                               00014000
         EJECT                                                          00015000
         B     @PB00002                                            0123 00016000
IGGPRACT DS    0H                                                  0124 00017000
         ENTRY IGGPRACT                                                 00018000
         DROP @15                                                       00019000
Z003     DS    0H                                                  0126 00020000
Z003RACT DS    0H                                                  0127 00021000
         STM 12,14,12(13)                                               00022000
         LA 13,12(13)                                                   00023000
         BALR 12,0                                                      00024000
IGGSEGST DS 0H                                                          00025000
*                                                                  0132 00026000
         USING *,12                                                     00027000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00028000
*   /*                                                               */ 00029000
*   /* RAC CATALOG VERIFICATION ROUTINE                              */ 00030000
*   /*                                                               */ 00031000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00032000
*                                                                  0133 00033000
*   IF CKAURACV=OFF THEN                                           0133 00034000
         L     @10,CCAR5REC(,R11)                                  0133 00035000
         TM    CKAURACV(@10),B'00100000'                           0133 00036000
         BZ    @RT00133                                            0133 00037000
*     ;                             /* IF NOT VERIFYING RAC          */ 00038000
*   ELSE                            /* VERIFYING RAC                 */ 00039000
*     IF CAXRAC=OFF THEN            /* IF CATLG NOT RAC DEF'D        */ 00040000
         L     @10,CCAACB(,R11)                                    0135 00041000
         L     @10,ACBUAPTR(,@10)                                  0135 00042000
         TM    CAXRAC(@10),B'00010000'                             0135 00043000
         BNZ   @RF00135                                            0135 00044000
*       CKAUCKPW=ON;                /* SHOULD CHECK PASSWORDS        */ 00045000
         L     @10,CCAR5REC(,R11)                                  0136 00046000
         OI    CKAUCKPW(@10),B'00010000'                           0136 00047000
*     ELSE                          /* CATLG IS RAC INDICATED        */ 00048000
*       IF CKAUCATC=OFF             /* IF CATALOG NOT ALREADY CHECKED   00049000
*                                      AT THE BASE LEVEL             */ 00050000
*           &CKAULVRQ¬=ON           /* & NO LEVEL SPECIFIED          */ 00051000
*           &RCDCINO¬=KATSECRD THEN /* & NOT ALREADY CHECKED         */ 00052000
         B     @RC00135                                            0137 00053000
@RF00135 L     @10,CCAR5REC(,R11)                                  0137 00054000
         TM    CKAUCATC(@10),B'00001000'                           0137 00055000
         BNZ   @RF00137                                            0137 00056000
         TM    CKAULVRQ(@10),B'00000010'                           0137 00057000
         BO    @RF00137                                            0137 00058000
         L     @05,CCAURAB(,R11)                                   0137 00059000
         L     @05,CCACPE1(,@05)                                   0137 00060000
         CLC   RCDCINO(3,@05),@CF00063+1                           0137 00061000
         BE    @RF00137                                            0137 00062000
*         DO;                       /* VERIFY CODE                   */ 00063000
*                                                                  0138 00064000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00065000
*           /*                                                       */ 00066000
*           /* SET PROPER AUTHORIZATION LEVEL                        */ 00067000
*           /*                                                       */ 00068000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00069000
*                                                                  0139 00070000
*           IF CKAUIMPL=ON THEN     /* IF IMPLICIT CHECKING          */ 00071000
         TM    CKAUIMPL(@10),B'10000000'                           0139 00072000
         BNO   @RF00139                                            0139 00073000
*             CKAURACL=MSTRPOS;     /* SET MASTER LEVEL AUTH REQD    */ 00074000
         MVC   CKAURACL(4,@10),@CF00056                            0140 00075000
*           ELSE                    /* CAN USE NORMAL LEVEL          */ 00076000
*             CKAURACL=CKAULEVL;    /* SET AUTH LEVEL REQD           */ 00077000
*                                                                  0141 00078000
         B     @RC00139                                            0141 00079000
@RF00139 L     @10,CCAR5REC(,R11)                                  0141 00080000
         L     @05,CKAULEVL(,@10)                                  0141 00081000
         ST    @05,CKAURACL(,@10)                                  0141 00082000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00083000
*           /*                                                       */ 00084000
*           /* CHECK IF TWO-STAGE RAC CHECKING IS NECESSARY IN ORDER */ 00085000
*           /* TO DETERMINE WHETHER PASSWORD READOUT SHOULD BE       */ 00086000
*           /* SUPPRESSED                                            */ 00087000
*           /*                                                       */ 00088000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00089000
*                                                                  0142 00090000
*           IF CKAURACL¬=MSTRPOS    /* IF NON-MASTER LEVEL           */ 00091000
*               &((CTGFUNC=CTGLOC&CCAGC4=ON)/* LOCATING P/W DATA     */ 00092000
*               |(CTGFUNC=CTGCMS&CTGOPTNS=CTGLTCAT)) THEN/* OR     0142 00093000
*                                      LISTCAT                       */ 00094000
@RC00139 L     @10,CCAR5REC(,R11)                                  0142 00095000
         CLC   CKAURACL(4,@10),@CF00056                            0142 00096000
         BE    @RF00142                                            0142 00097000
         L     @10,CCACPL(,R11)                                    0142 00098000
         TM    CTGFUNC(@10),B'00100000'                            0142 00099000
         BNO   @GL00004                                            0142 00100000
         TM    CTGFUNC(@10),B'11000000'                            0142 00101000
         BNZ   @GL00004                                            0142 00102000
         TM    CCAGC4(R11),B'01000000'                             0142 00103000
         BO    @RT00142                                            0142 00104000
@GL00004 L     @10,CCACPL(,R11)                                    0142 00105000
         TM    CTGFUNC(@10),B'10000000'                            0142 00106000
         BNO   @RF00142                                            0142 00107000
         TM    CTGFUNC(@10),B'01100000'                            0142 00108000
         BNZ   @RF00142                                            0142 00109000
         TM    CTGOPTNS(@10),B'00100000'                           0142 00110000
         BNO   @RF00142                                            0142 00111000
         TM    CTGOPTNS(@10),B'11011000'                           0142 00112000
         BNZ   @RF00142                                            0142 00113000
@RT00142 DS    0H                                                  0143 00114000
*             DO;                                                  0143 00115000
*               CKAUDOUB=ON;        /* INDICATE 2-STAGE RACHECK      */ 00116000
         L     @10,CCAR5REC(,R11)                                  0144 00117000
         OI    CKAUDOUB(@10),B'01000000'                           0144 00118000
*               CKAUSVLV=CKAURACL;  /* SAVE AUTH LEVEL               */ 00119000
         L     @05,CKAURACL(,@10)                                  0145 00120000
         ST    @05,CKAUSVLV(,@10)                                  0145 00121000
*               CKAURACL=MSTRPOS;   /* TRY MASTER LEVEL AUTH 1ST     */ 00122000
         MVC   CKAURACL(4,@10),@CF00056                            0146 00123000
*             END;                                                 0147 00124000
*           ELSE                                                   0148 00125000
*             ;                     /* NO SUPPRESSION REQUIRED       */ 00126000
*                                                                  0148 00127000
@RF00142 DS    0H                                                  0149 00128000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00129000
*           /*                                                       */ 00130000
*           /* INVOKE RAC CHECKING ROUTINE                           */ 00131000
*           /*                                                       */ 00132000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00133000
*                                                                  0149 00134000
*           CKAUGLOB=ON;            /* INDICATE GLOBAL REQUEST       */ 00135000
*           CKAUCATC=ON;            /* INDICATE CATLG CHECK          */ 00136000
         L     @10,CCAR5REC(,R11)                                  0150 00137000
         OI    CKAUGLOB(@10),B'00001100'                           0150 00138000
*Z004RACK:                                                         0151 00139000
*           CALL IGGPRACK;          /* CHECK AUTH                    */ 00140000
Z004RACK BAL   @14,IGGPRACK                                        0151 00141000
*           CKAUCATC=OFF;           /* RESET CATLG CHECK SWITCH      */ 00142000
         L     @10,CCAR5REC(,R11)                                  0152 00143000
         NI    CKAUCATC(@10),B'11110111'                           0152 00144000
*           R3=CKAULEVL;            /* RESTORE REGISTER              */ 00145000
         L     R3,CKAULEVL(,@10)                                   0153 00146000
*         END;                      /* OF VERIFY CODE                */ 00147000
*       ELSE                                                       0155 00148000
*         ;                         /* NO CATALOG VERIFY TO DO       */ 00149000
@RF00137 DS    0H                                                  0156 00150000
*   CALL EXIT;                      /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 00151000
@RC00135 DS    0H                                                  0156 00152000
@RT00133 BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0156 00153000
*   GEN(DS 0F);                     /* FULLWORD BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT   */ 00154000
         DS 0F                                                          00155000
*   GEN(DC CL8'IGGPRACG');          /* NAME OF FOLLOWING PROCEDURE   */ 00156000

*       END;                        /* OF CATALOG GROUP              */ 00569000

*   GEN(ENTRY IGGPRACS );           /* IDENTIFY ENTRY-POINT SYMBOL   */ 00879000
         ENTRY IGGPRACS                                                 00880000
*Z014:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 00881000
*Z014RACS:                          /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 00882000
*   RFY                                                            0322 00883000
*    (R5,                                                          0322 00884000
*     R6,                                                          0322 00885000

*   RFY                                                            0323 00892000
*    (R2,                                                          0323 00893000
*     R3,                                                          0323 00894000
*     R4) RSTD;                     /* RESTRICT LOCAL WORK REGISTERS */ 00895000
*   GEN(STM 12,14,12(13));          /* SAVE REGISTERS OF CALLER      */ 00896000
         STM 12,14,12(13)                                               00897000
*   GEN(LA 13,12(13));              /* POINT TO NEXT SAVE AREA       */ 00898000
         LA 13,12(13)                                                   00899000
*   GEN(BALR 12,0);                 /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY      */ 00900000
         BALR 12,0                                                      00901000
*   GEN(LA 15,*-IGGSEGST(0,0));     /* COMPUTE MODULE BASE           */ 00902000

*   GEN(SR 12,15);                  /* SET BASE TO MODULE BASE       */ 00904000
*                                                                  0328 00905000
         SR 12,15                                                       00906000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00907000
*   /*                                                               */ 00908000
*   /* ROUTINE TO SETUP FOR EXTRACT                                  */ 00909000
*   /*                                                               */ 00910000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00911000
*                                                                  0329 00912000
*   CCAXCPL=ADDR(CKAUCPL);          /* POINT TO EXTRACT CPL          */ 00913000

         ST    @05,CCAXCPL(,R11)                                   0329 00916000
*   RFY                                                            0330 00917000
*     CTGPL BASED(CCAXCPL);         /* MAP EXTRACT CPL               */ 00918000
*                                                                  0330 00919000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00920000
*   /*                                                               */ 00921000
*   /* SET UP CPL                                                    */ 00922000
*   /*                                                               */ 00923000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00924000
*                                                                  0331 00925000

*   CTGNOFLD=1;                     /* ONLY 1 FPL                    */ 00931000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00934000
*   /*                                                               */ 00935000
*   /* SET UP FPL                                                    */ 00936000
*   /*                                                               */ 00937000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00938000
*                                                                  0334 00939000
*   RFY                                                            0334 00940000
*     CTGFL BASED(CTGFIELD(1));     /* MAP EXTRACT FPL               */ 00941000
*   CTGFL=CTGFL&&CTGFL;             /* CLEAR EXTRACT FPL             */ 00942000
         XC    CTGFL(16,@10),CTGFL(@10)                            0335 00943000
*   CTGFLDNO=1;                     /* SINGLE DATA FIELD SET         */ 00944000

*   CTGFLPT(1)=NULL;                /* CLEAR DATA POINTER            */ 00946000
         SLR   @05,@05                                             0337 00947000

*   CTGFLNG(1)=NULL;                /* CLEAR DATA LENGTH             */ 00949000
*                                                                  0338 00950000
         ST    @05,CTGFLNG(,@10)                                   0338 00951000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00952000
*   /*                                                               */ 00953000
*   /* SET UP CCA FIELDS FOR EXTRACT                                 */ 00954000
*   /*                                                               */ 00955000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00956000
*                                                                  0339 00957000
*   CCAREUSE=ON;                    /* INDICATE REUSEABLE RAB'S      */ 00958000
         OI    CCAREUSE(R11),B'00000100'                           0339 00959000
*   CCAF2NVC=ON;                    /* INDICATE NO VALIDITY CHK      */ 00960000

*   CCARABB=CCAURAB;                /* SET BASE RAB                  */ 00962000

*   CCARABF=ADDR(CCARAB1);          /* FIRST RAB FOR EXTRACT         */ 00965000
         LA    @10,CCARAB1(,R11)                                   0342 00966000
         ST    @10,CCARABF(,R11)                                   0342 00967000
*   CCARABL=ADDR(CCARAB3);          /* LAST RAB FOR EXTRACT          */ 00968000

         OI    CCAEXT(R11),B'00000010'                             0344 00972000

*     CTGPL BASED(CCACPL);          /* RESET CPL MAPPING             */ 00974000

         BAL   @14,EXIT                                            0347 00978000
*   GEN(DS 0F);                     /* FULLWORD BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT   */ 00979000
         DS 0F                                                          00980000

         DC CL8'IGGPRACV'                                               00982000

*   GEN(ENTRY IGGPRACV );           /* IDENTIFY ENTRY-POINT SYMBOL   */ 01001000
         ENTRY IGGPRACV                                                 01002000
*Z015:                              /* LABEL FOR PROCEDURE TRACKING  */ 01003000

*   GEN(LA 13,12(13));              /* POINT TO NEXT SAVE AREA       */ 01020000

         SR 12,15                                                       01028000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01029000
*   /*                                                               */ 01030000
*   /* RAC VERIFICATION ROUTINE                                      */ 01031000
*   /*                                                               */ 01032000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01033000
*                                                                  0361 01034000
*   IF RCDEXSEC=ON                  /* IF ENTITY RAC INDICATED       */ 01035000
*       |(CKAUCATC=ON               /* OR CATLG CHK NEEDED           */ 01036000
*       &CAXRAC=ON) THEN            /* AND CATLG RAC INDICATED       */ 01037000

*       /*                                                           */ 01057000
